2306 /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2307
2308 Hexa_List.clear();
2309
2310 for (it = Pris_List.begin(); it != Pris_List.end(); it++) {
2311 kElem = it->first;
2312 iElem = it->second;
2313
2314 /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2315 to local values on this rank. ---*/
2316
2317 NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PRISM;
2318 for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2319 iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pris[iElem * NODES_PER_ELEMENT + iNode];
2320 Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2321 }
2322
2323 /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2324
2325 elem[jElem] =
2326 new CPrism(Local_Nodes[0], Local_Nodes[1], Local_Nodes[2], Local_Nodes[3], Local_Nodes[4], Local_Nodes[5]);
2327
2328 elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2329
2330 /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2331
2332 jElem++;
2333 iElemPris++;
2334 }
2335
2336 /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2337
2338 Pris_List.clear();
2339
2340 for (it = Pyra_List.begin(); it != Pyra_List.end(); it++) {
2341 kElem = it->first;
2342 iElem = it->second;
2343
2344 /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2345 to local values on this rank. ---*/
2346
2347 NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PYRAMID;
2348 for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2349 iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pyra[iElem * NODES_PER_ELEMENT + iNode];
2350 Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2351 }
2352
2353 /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2354
2355 elem[jElem] = new CPyramid(Local_Nodes[0], Local_Nodes[1], Local_Nodes[2], Local_Nodes[3], Local_Nodes[4]);
2356
2357 elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2358
2359 /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2360
2361 jElem++;
2362 iElemPyra++;
2363 }
2364
2365 /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2366
2367 Pyra_List.clear();
2368
2369 /*--- Communicate the number of each element type to all processors. These
2370 values are important for merging and writing output later. ---*/
2371
2372 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_Elem, &Global_nElem, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2373
2374 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
2375 cout << Global_nElem << " interior elements including halo cells. " << endl;
2376
2377 /*--- Set the value of Global_nElemDomain (stored in the geometry
2378 container that is passed in). ---*/
2379
2380 Global_nElemDomain = geometry->GetGlobal_nElemDomain();
2381
2382 /*--- Store total number of each element type after incrementing the
2383 counters in the recv loop above (to make sure there aren't repeats). ---*/
2384
2385 nelem_triangle = iElemTria;
2386 nelem_quad = iElemQuad;
2387 nelem_tetra = iElemTetr;
2388 nelem_hexa = iElemHexa;
2389 nelem_prism = iElemPris;
2390 nelem_pyramid = iElemPyra;
2391
2392#ifdef HAVE_MPI
2393 unsigned long Local_nElemTri = nelem_triangle;
2394 unsigned long Local_nElemQuad = nelem_quad;
2395 unsigned long Local_nElemTet = nelem_tetra;
2396 unsigned long Local_nElemHex = nelem_hexa;
2397 unsigned long Local_nElemPrism = nelem_prism;
2398 unsigned long Local_nElemPyramid = nelem_pyramid;
2399
2400 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTri, &Global_nelem_triangle, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2401 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemQuad, &Global_nelem_quad, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2402 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTet, &Global_nelem_tetra, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2403 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemHex, &Global_nelem_hexa, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2404 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPrism, &Global_nelem_prism, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2405 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPyramid, &Global_nelem_pyramid, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2406#else
2407 Global_nelem_triangle = nelem_triangle;
2408 Global_nelem_quad = nelem_quad;
2409 Global_nelem_tetra = nelem_tetra;
2410 Global_nelem_hexa = nelem_hexa;
2411 Global_nelem_prism = nelem_prism;
2412 Global_nelem_pyramid = nelem_pyramid;
2413#endif
2414
2415 /*--- Print information about the elements to the console ---*/
2416
2417 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2418 if (Global_nelem_triangle > 0) cout << Global_nelem_triangle << " triangles." << endl;
2419 if (Global_nelem_quad > 0) cout << Global_nelem_quad << " quadrilaterals." << endl;
2420 if (Global_nelem_tetra > 0) cout << Global_nelem_tetra << " tetrahedra." << endl;
2421 if (Global_nelem_hexa > 0) cout << Global_nelem_hexa << " hexahedra." << endl;
2422 if (Global_nelem_prism > 0) cout << Global_nelem_prism << " prisms." << endl;
2423 if (Global_nelem_pyramid > 0) cout << Global_nelem_pyramid << " pyramids." << endl;
2424 }
2425}
2426
2427void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadSurfaceElements(CConfig* config, CGeometry* geometry) {
2428 unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
2429 unsigned short iNode, nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
2430
2431 unsigned long iElem, iMarker, Global_Marker, iGlobal_Index;
2432
2433 unsigned long iElem_Line = 0;
2434 unsigned long iElem_Tria = 0;
2435 unsigned long iElem_Quad = 0;
2436
2437 unsigned long Local_Nodes[N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON];
2438
2439 vector<vector<unsigned long> > Line_List;
2440 vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundTria_List;
2441 vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundQuad_List;
2442
2443 vector<unsigned long> Marker_Local;
2444
2445 /*--- Compute how many markers we have local to this rank by looping
2446 through the global marker numbers of each local surface element and
2447 counting the unique set. ---*/
2448
2449 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2450 if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(), ID_Line[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2451 Marker_Local.push_back(ID_Line[iElem]);
2452 }
2453 }
2454
2455 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2456 if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(), ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2457 Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2458 }
2459 }
2460
2461 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2462 if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(), ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2463 Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2464 }
2465 }
2466
2467 /*--- Create a mapping from global to local marker ID and v.v.
2468 * (the latter being just an alias). ---*/
2469
2470 unordered_map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Marker_Global_to_Local;
2471 const vector<unsigned long>& Marker_Local_to_Global = Marker_Local;
2472
2473 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++) {
2474 Marker_Global_to_Local[Marker_Local[iMarker]] = iMarker;
2475 }
2476
2477 /*--- Set up our element counters on each marker so that we can avoid
2478 duplicating any elements from the previous communications. ---*/
2479
2480 Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2481 BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2482 BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2483
2484 /*--- Count the number of elements on each marker and store in a
2485 vector by marker. ---*/
2486
2487 vector<unsigned long> nElemBound_Local;
2488 nElemBound_Local.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2489 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++) nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
2490
2491 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2492 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
2493 if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
2494 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2495 Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
2496 }
2497 }
2498
2499 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2500 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
2501 if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) ==
2502 BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
2503 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2504 BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2505 }
2506 }
2507
2508 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2509 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
2510 if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) ==
2511 BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
2512 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2513 BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2514 }
2515 }
2516
2517 /*--- Create the domain structures for the boundaries. Initially, stick
2518 with nMarkerMax here, but come back and compute size we need. Same for
2519 OVERHEAD - this can precomputed. ---*/
2520
2521 nMarker = Marker_Local.size();
2522 nElem_Bound = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
2523 Tag_to_Marker = new string[nMarker_Max];
2524 Marker_All_SendRecv = new short[nMarker_Max];
2525
2526 /*--- Allocate space for the elements on each marker ---*/
2527
2528 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElemBound_Local[iMarker];
2529
2530 bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker + (OVERHEAD * size)];
2531 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker + (OVERHEAD * size); iMarker++) bound[iMarker] = nullptr;
2532
2533 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
2534
2535 /*--- Initialize boundary element counters ---*/
2536
2537 iElem_Line = 0;
2538 iElem_Tria = 0;
2539 iElem_Quad = 0;
2540
2541 Line_List.clear();
2542 Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2543 BoundTria_List.clear();
2544 BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2545 BoundQuad_List.clear();
2546 BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2547
2548 /*--- Reset our element counter on a marker-basis. ---*/
2549
2550 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
2551
2552 /*--- Store the boundary element connectivity. Note here that we have
2553 communicated the global index values for the elements, so we need to
2554 convert this to the local index when instantiating the element. ---*/
2555
2556 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2557 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
2558
2559 /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2560
2561 if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
2562 /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2563 to local values on this rank. ---*/
2564
2565 NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_LINE;
2566 for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2567 iGlobal_Index = Conn_Line[iElem * NODES_PER_ELEMENT + iNode];
2568 Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2569 }
2570
2571 /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2572
2573 bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CLine(Local_Nodes[0], Local_Nodes[1]);
2574
2575 /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2576
2577 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2578 iElem_Line++;
2579
2580 Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
2581 }
2582 }
2583
2584 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2585 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
2586
2587 /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2588
2589 if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) ==
2590 BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
2591 /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2592 to local values on this rank. ---*/
2593
2594 NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
2595 for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2596 iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundTria[iElem * NODES_PER_ELEMENT + iNode];
2597 Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2598 }
2599
2600 /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2601
2602 bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CTriangle(Local_Nodes[0], Local_Nodes[1], Local_Nodes[2]);
2603
2604 /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2605
2606 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2607 iElem_Tria++;
2608
2609 BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2610 }
2611 }
2612
2613 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2614 iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
2615
2616 /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2617
2618 if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(), Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) ==
2619 BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
2620 /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2621 to local values on this rank. ---*/
2622
2623 NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
2624 for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2625 iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundQuad[iElem * NODES_PER_ELEMENT + iNode];
2626 Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2627 }
2628
2629 /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2630
2631 bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] =
2632 new CQuadrilateral(Local_Nodes[0], Local_Nodes[1], Local_Nodes[2], Local_Nodes[3]);
2633
2634 /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2635
2636 nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2637 iElem_Quad++;
2638
2639 BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2640 }
2641 }
2642
2643 /*--- Store total number of each boundary element type ---*/
2644
2645 nelem_edge_bound = iElem_Line;
2646 nelem_triangle_bound = iElem_Tria;
2647 nelem_quad_bound = iElem_Quad;
2648
2649 /*--- Set some auxiliary information on a per-marker basis. ---*/
2650
2651 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2652 Global_Marker = Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker];
2653
2654 /*--- Now each domain has the right information ---*/
2655
2656 string Grid_Marker = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(Global_Marker);
2657 short SendRecv = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(Global_Marker);
2658
2659 Tag_to_Marker[iMarker] = Marker_Tags[Global_Marker];
2660 Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = SendRecv;
2661
2662 /*--- Set the marker tags correctly to match the values in config. ---*/
2663
2664 config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Tag_to_Marker[iMarker]);
2665 config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
2666 }
2667
2668 /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery computations ---*/
2669
2670 nSpanWiseSections = new unsigned short[2]();
2671 SpanWiseValue = new su2double*[2]();
2672
2673 nSpanSectionsByMarker = new unsigned short[nMarker]();
2674 nVertexSpan = new long*[nMarker]();
2675 nTotVertexSpan = new unsigned long*[nMarker]();
2676 turbovertex = new CTurboVertex***[nMarker]();
2677 AverageTurboNormal = new su2double**[nMarker]();
2678 AverageNormal = new su2double**[nMarker]();
2679 AverageGridVel = new su2double**[nMarker]();
2680 AverageTangGridVel = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2681 SpanArea = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2682 TurboRadius = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2683 MaxAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2684 MinAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2685 MinRelAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker]();
2686
2687 /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery performance computation ---*/
2688
2689 nTurboPerf = config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance();
2690 TangGridVelIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2691 SpanAreaIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2692 TurboRadiusIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2693 TangGridVelOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2694 SpanAreaOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2695 TurboRadiusOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf]();
2696}
2697
2698void CPhysicalGeometry::InitiateCommsAll(void* bufSend, const int* nElemSend, SU2_MPI::Request* sendReq, void* bufRecv,
2699 const int* nElemRecv, SU2_MPI::Request* recvReq, unsigned short countPerElem,
2700 unsigned short commType) {
2701 /*--- Local variables ---*/
2702
2703 int iMessage, iProc, offset, nElem, count, source, dest, tag;
2704
2705 /*--- Launch the non-blocking recv's first. ---*/
2706
2707 iMessage = 0;
2708 for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
2709 /*--- Post recv's only if another proc is sending us data. We do
2710 not communicate with ourselves or post recv's for zero length
2711 messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
2712
2713 if ((nElemRecv[iProc + 1] > nElemRecv[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
2714 /*--- Compute our location in the recv buffer. ---*/
2715
2716 offset = countPerElem * nElemRecv[iProc];
2717
2718 /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
2719 of elems that we need to recv. ---*/
2720
2721 nElem = nElemRecv[iProc + 1] - nElemRecv[iProc];
2722
2723 /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
2724
2725 count = countPerElem * nElem;
2726
2727 /*--- Post non-blocking recv for this proc. ---*/
2728
2729 source = iProc;
2730 tag = iProc + 1;
2731
2732 switch (commType) {
2733 case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
2734 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_DOUBLE, source, tag,
2735 SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2736 break;
2737 case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
2738 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, source, tag,
2739 SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2740 break;
2741 case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
2742 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<long*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_LONG, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2743 &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2744 break;
2745 case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
2746 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, source, tag,
2747 SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2748 break;
2749 case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
2750 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<char*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_CHAR, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2751 &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2752 break;
2753 case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
2754 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<short*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_SHORT, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2755 &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2756 break;
2757 case COMM_TYPE_INT:
2758 SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<int*>(bufRecv)[offset]), count, MPI_INT, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2759 &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2760 break;
2761 default:
2762 break;
2763 }
2764
2765 /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
2766
2767 iMessage++;
2768 }
2769 }
2770
2771 /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends next. ---*/
2772
2773 iMessage = 0;
2774 for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
2775 /*--- Post sends only if we are sending another proc data. We do
2776 not communicate with ourselves or post sends for zero length
2777 messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
2778
2779 if ((nElemSend[iProc + 1] > nElemSend[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
2780 /*--- Compute our location in the send buffer. ---*/
2781
2782 offset = countPerElem * nElemSend[iProc];
2783
2784 /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
2785 of elems that we need to send. ---*/
2786
2787 nElem = nElemSend[iProc + 1] - nElemSend[iProc];
2788
2789 /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
2790
2791 count = countPerElem * nElem;
2792
2793 /*--- Post non-blocking send for this proc. ---*/
2794
2795 dest = iProc;
2796 tag = rank + 1;
2797
2798 switch (commType) {
2799 case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
2800 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2801 &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2802 break;
2803 case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
2804 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, dest, tag,
2805 SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2806 break;
2807 case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
2808 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<long*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_LONG, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2809 &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2810 break;
2811 case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
2812 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, dest, tag,
2813 SU2_MPI::GetComm(), &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2814 break;
2815 case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
2816 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<char*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_CHAR, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2817 &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2818 break;
2819 case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
2820 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<short*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_SHORT, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2821 &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2822 break;
2823 case COMM_TYPE_INT:
2824 SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<int*>(bufSend)[offset]), count, MPI_INT, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2825 &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2826 break;
2827 default:
2828 break;
2829 }
2830
2831 /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
2832
2833 iMessage++;
2834 }
2835 }
2836}
2837
2838void CPhysicalGeometry::CompleteCommsAll(int nSends, SU2_MPI::Request* sendReq, int nRecvs, SU2_MPI::Request* recvReq) {
2839 /*--- Local variables ---*/
2840
2841 int ind, iSend, iRecv;
2842 SU2_MPI::Status status;
2843
2844 /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
2845
2846 for (iSend = 0; iSend < nSends; iSend++) SU2_MPI::Waitany(nSends, sendReq, &ind, &status);
2847
2848 /*--- Wait for the non-blocking recvs to complete. ---*/
2849
2850 for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nRecvs; iRecv++) SU2_MPI::Waitany(nRecvs, recvReq, &ind, &status);
2851}
2852
2853void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareOffsets(unsigned long val_npoint_global) {
2854 /*--- Compute the number of points that will be on each processor.
2855 This is a linear partitioning with the addition of a simple load
2856 balancing for any remainder points. ---*/
2857
2858 if (beg_node == nullptr) beg_node = new unsigned long[size];
2859 if (end_node == nullptr) end_node = new unsigned long[size];
2860
2861 if (nPointLinear == nullptr) nPointLinear = new unsigned long[size];
2862 if (nPointCumulative == nullptr) nPointCumulative = new unsigned long[size + 1];
2863
2864 unsigned long quotient = val_npoint_global / size;
2865 int remainder = int(val_npoint_global % size);
2866 for (int ii = 0; ii < size; ii++) {
2867 nPointLinear[ii] = quotient + int(ii < remainder);
2868 }
2869
2870 /*--- Store the local number of nodes on each proc in the linear
2871 partitioning, the beginning/end index, and the linear partitioning
2872 within an array in cumulative storage format. ---*/
2873
2874 beg_node[0] = 0;
2875 end_node[0] = beg_node[0] + nPointLinear[0];
2876 nPointCumulative[0] = 0;
2877 for (int iProc = 1; iProc < size; iProc++) {
2878 beg_node[iProc] = end_node[iProc - 1];
2879 end_node[iProc] = beg_node[iProc] + nPointLinear[iProc];
2880 nPointCumulative[iProc] = nPointCumulative[iProc - 1] + nPointLinear[iProc - 1];
2881 }
2882 nPointCumulative[size] = val_npoint_global;
2883}
2884
2885unsigned long CPhysicalGeometry::GetLinearPartition(unsigned long val_global_index) {
2886 unsigned long iProcessor = 0;
2887
2888 /*--- Initial guess ---*/
2889
2890 iProcessor = val_global_index / nPointLinear[0];
2891
2892 /*--- Guard against going over size. ---*/
2893
2894 if (iProcessor >= (unsigned long)size) iProcessor = (unsigned long)size - 1;
2895
2896 /*--- Move up or down until we find the processor. ---*/
2897
2898 if (val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor])
2899 while (val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor + 1]) iProcessor++;
2900 else
2901 while (val_global_index < nPointCumulative[iProcessor]) iProcessor--;
2902
2903 return iProcessor;
2904}
2905
2906void CPhysicalGeometry::SortAdjacency(const CConfig* config) {
2907#ifdef HAVE_MPI
2908#ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
2909
2910 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) cout << "Executing the partitioning functions." << endl;
2911
2912 /*--- Post process the adjacency information in order to get it into the
2913 CSR format before sending the data to ParMETIS. We need to remove
2914 repeats and adjust the size of the array for each local node. ---*/
2915
2916 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) cout << "Building the graph adjacency structure." << endl;
2917
2918 /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
2919 index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
2920
2921 CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain, 0);
2922
2923 /*--- We can already create the array that indexes the adjacency. ---*/
2924
2925 xadj.resize(pointPartitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank) + 1);
2926 xadj[0] = 0;
2927
2928 /*--- Here, we transfer the adjacency information from a multi-dim vector
2929 on a node-by-node basis into a single vector container. First, we sort
2930 the entries and remove the duplicates we find for each node, then we
2931 copy it into the single vect and clear memory from the multi-dim vec. ---*/
2932
2933 unsigned long total_adj_size = 0;
2934 for (auto& neighbors : adj_nodes) {
2935 /*--- For each point, sort the adjacency in ascending order
2936 so that we can remove duplicates and complete the size for
2937 unique set of adjacent nodes for that point. ---*/
2938
2939 sort(neighbors.begin(), neighbors.end());
2940 auto it = unique(neighbors.begin(), neighbors.end());
2941 const auto local_size = it - neighbors.begin();
2942 neighbors.resize(local_size);
2943 total_adj_size += local_size;
2944 }
2945
2946 /*--- Now that we know the size, create the final adjacency array. This
2947 is the array that we will feed to ParMETIS for partitioning. ---*/
2948
2949 adjacency.resize(0);
2950 adjacency.reserve(total_adj_size);
2951
2952 unsigned long iPoint = 0;
2953 for (const auto& neighbors : adj_nodes) {
2954 /*--- Move the sorted adjacency into a 1-D vector for all
2955 points for loading into ParMETIS for partitioning next. ---*/
2956 for (auto jPoint : neighbors) adjacency.push_back(jPoint);
2957
2958 /*--- Increment the starting index for the next point (CSR). ---*/
2959 xadj[iPoint + 1] = xadj[iPoint] + neighbors.size();
2960 ++iPoint;
2961 }
2962
2963 /*--- Force free the entire old multi-dim. adjacency vector. ---*/
2964
2965 decltype(adj_nodes)().swap(adj_nodes);
2966
2967#endif
2968#endif
2969}
2970
2971void CPhysicalGeometry::SetSendReceive(const CConfig* config) {
2972 unsigned short Counter_Send, Counter_Receive, iMarkerSend, iMarkerReceive;
2973 unsigned long iVertex, LocalNode;
2974 unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
2975 unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iElem, nDomain, iDomain, jDomain;
2976 auto* nVertexDomain = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
2977 unsigned short iNode, jNode;
2978 vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
2979
2980 vector<vector<unsigned long> >
2981 SendTransfLocal; /*!< \brief Vector to store the type of transformation for this send point. */
2982 vector<vector<unsigned long> >
2983 ReceivedTransfLocal; /*!< \brief Vector to store the type of transformation for this received point. */
2984 vector<vector<unsigned long> > SendDomainLocal; /*!< \brief SendDomain[from domain][to domain] and return the point
2985 index of the node that must me sended. */
2986 vector<vector<unsigned long> > ReceivedDomainLocal; /*!< \brief SendDomain[from domain][to domain] and return the
2987 point index of the node that must me sended. */
2988
2989 unordered_map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::const_iterator MI;
2990
2991 if (rank == MASTER_NODE && size > SINGLE_NODE) cout << "Establishing MPI communication patterns." << endl;
2992
2993 nDomain = size;
2994
2995 SendTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
2996 ReceivedTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
2997 SendDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
2998 ReceivedDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
2999
3000 /*--- Loop over the all the points of the elements on this rank in order
3001 to find the points with different colors. Create the send/received lists
3002 from this information. ---*/
3003
3004 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
3005 for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3006 iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
3007 iDomain = nodes->GetColor(iPoint);
3008
3009 if (iDomain == (unsigned long)rank) {
3010 for (jNode = 0; jNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); jNode++) {
3011 jPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
3012 jDomain = nodes->GetColor(jPoint);
3013
3014 /*--- If one of the neighbors is a different color and connected
3015 by an edge, then we add them to the list. ---*/
3016
3017 if (iDomain != jDomain) {
3018 /*--- We send from iDomain to jDomain the value of iPoint,
3019 we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
3020
3021 SendDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]);
3022
3023 /*--- We send from jDomain to iDomain the value of jPoint,
3024 we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
3025
3026 ReceivedDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint]);
3027 }
3028 }
3029 }
3030 }
3031 }
3032
3033 /*--- Sort the points that must be sent and delete repeated points, note
3034 that the sorting should be done with the global index (not the local). ---*/
3035
3036 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3037 sort(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3038 it = unique(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3039 SendDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
3040 }
3041
3042 /*--- Sort the points that must be received and delete repeated points, note
3043 that the sorting should be done with the global point (not the local). ---*/
3044
3045 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3046 sort(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3047 it = unique(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3048 ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
3049 }
3050
3051 /*--- Create Global to Local Point array, note that the array is smaller (Max_GlobalPoint) than the total
3052 number of points in the simulation ---*/
3053 Max_GlobalPoint = 0;
3054 for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3055 if (Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint] > (long)Max_GlobalPoint) Max_GlobalPoint = Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint];
3056 }
3057
3058 /*--- Set the value of some of the points ---*/
3059 for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) Global_to_Local_Point[Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]] = iPoint;
3060
3061 /*--- Add the new MPI send boundaries, reset the transformation,
3062 and save the local value. ---*/
3063
3064 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3065 if (!SendDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) {
3066 nVertexDomain[nMarker] = SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
3067 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
3068 MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3069 if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
3070 iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
3071 else
3072 iPoint = std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::max();
3073
3074 SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
3075 SendTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
3076 }
3077 nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
3078 bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
3079 nMarker++;
3080 }
3081 }
3082
3083 /*--- Add the new MPI receive boundaries, reset the transformation, and save the local value ---*/
3084 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3085 if (!ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) {
3086 nVertexDomain[nMarker] = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
3087 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
3088 MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3089 if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
3090 iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
3091 else
3092 iPoint = std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::max();
3093
3094 ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
3095 ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
3096 }
3097 nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
3098 bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
3099 nMarker++;
3100 }
3101 }
3102
3103 /*--- First compute the Send/Receive boundaries ---*/
3104 Counter_Send = 0;
3105 Counter_Receive = 0;
3106 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3107 if (!SendDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) Counter_Send++;
3108
3109 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3110 if (!ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) Counter_Receive++;
3111
3112 iMarkerSend = nMarker - Counter_Send - Counter_Receive;
3113 iMarkerReceive = nMarker - Counter_Receive;
3114
3115 /*--- First we do the send ---*/
3116 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3117 if (!SendDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) {
3118 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerSend); iVertex++) {
3119 LocalNode = SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
3120 bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode);
3121 bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(SendTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3122 }
3123 Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerSend] = iDomain + 1;
3124 iMarkerSend++;
3125 }
3126 }
3127
3128 /*--- Second we do the receive ---*/
3129 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3130 if (!ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].empty()) {
3131 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerReceive); iVertex++) {
3132 LocalNode = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
3133 bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode);
3134 bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3135 }
3136 Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerReceive] = -(iDomain + 1);
3137 iMarkerReceive++;
3138 }
3139 }
3140
3141 /*--- Free memory ---*/
3142
3143 delete[] nVertexDomain;
3144}
3145
3146void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundaries(CConfig* config) {
3147 unsigned long iElem_Bound, TotalElem, *nElem_Bound_Copy, iVertex_;
3148 string Grid_Marker;
3149 unsigned short iDomain, nDomain, iMarkersDomain, iLoop, *DomainCount, nMarker_Physical, Duplicate_SendReceive,
3150 *DomainSendCount, **DomainSendMarkers, *DomainReceiveCount, **DomainReceiveMarkers, nMarker_SendRecv, iMarker,
3151 iMarker_;
3152 CPrimalGrid*** bound_Copy;
3153 short* Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
3154 bool CheckStart;
3155
3156 nDomain = size + 1;
3157
3158 /*--- Count the number of physical markers
3159 in the boundaries ---*/
3160
3161 nMarker_Physical = 0;
3162 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3163 if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
3164 nMarker_Physical++;
3165 }
3166 }
3167
3168 /*--- Identify if there are markers that send/received with the same domain,
3169 they should be together---*/
3170
3171 Duplicate_SendReceive = 0;
3172 for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < 2; iLoop++) {
3173 DomainCount = new unsigned short[nDomain];
3174
3175 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) DomainCount[iDomain] = 0;
3176
3177 if (iLoop == 0) {
3178 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3179 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
3180 if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
3181 if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
3182 } else {
3183 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3184 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
3185 if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
3186 if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
3187 }
3188
3189 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3190 if (DomainCount[iDomain] > 1) Duplicate_SendReceive++;
3191
3192 delete[] DomainCount;
3193 }
3194
3195 DomainSendCount = new unsigned short[nDomain];
3196 DomainSendMarkers = new unsigned short*[nDomain];
3197 DomainReceiveCount = new unsigned short[nDomain];
3198 DomainReceiveMarkers = new unsigned short*[nDomain];
3199
3200 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3201 DomainSendCount[iDomain] = 0;
3202 DomainSendMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short[nMarker];
3203
3204 DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] = 0;
3205 DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short[nMarker];
3206 }
3207
3208 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3209 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3210 if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX) {
3211 if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) {
3212 DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][DomainSendCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
3213 DomainSendCount[iDomain]++;
3214 }
3215 if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) {
3216 DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
3217 DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]++;
3218 }
3219 }
3220 }
3221 }
3222
3223 /*--- Create an structure to store the Send/Receive
3224 boundaries, because they require some reorganization ---*/
3225
3226 nMarker_SendRecv = nMarker - nMarker_Physical - Duplicate_SendReceive;
3227 bound_Copy = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3228 nElem_Bound_Copy = new unsigned long[nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3229 Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy = new short[nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3230 iMarker_ = nMarker_Physical;
3231 iVertex_ = 0;
3232 CheckStart = false;
3233
3234 /*--- Copy and allocate the physical markers in the data structure ---*/
3235
3236 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3237 if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
3238 nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker] = nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3239 bound_Copy[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
3240
3241 for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3242 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE)
3243 bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] =
3244 new CLine(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1));
3245 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE)
3246
3247 bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] =
3248 new CTriangle(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
3249 bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2));
3250 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL)
3251 bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] =
3252 new CQuadrilateral(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
3253 bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2), bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(3));
3254 }
3255 }
3256 }
3257
3258 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3259 /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
3260 boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
3261
3262 if (DomainSendCount[iDomain] != 0) {
3263 TotalElem = 0;
3264 for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3265 iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3266 TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3267 }
3268 if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
3269 CheckStart = true;
3270 iVertex_ = 0;
3271 nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
3272 bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
3273 }
3274
3275 for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3276 iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3277 Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
3278
3279 for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3280 bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0));
3281 bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
3282 iVertex_++;
3283 }
3284 }
3285
3286 /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
3287 boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
3288
3289 if (DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] != 0) {
3290 TotalElem = 0;
3291 for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3292 iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3293 TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3294 }
3295 if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
3296 CheckStart = true;
3297 iVertex_ = 0;
3298 nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
3299 bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
3300 }
3301
3302 for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3303 iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3304 Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
3305
3306 for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3307 bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0));
3308 bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
3309 iVertex_++;
3310 }
3311 }
3312 }
3313
3314 delete[] DomainSendCount;
3315 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) delete[] DomainSendMarkers[iDomain];
3316 delete[] DomainSendMarkers;
3317
3318 delete[] DomainReceiveCount;
3319 for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) delete[] DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain];
3320 delete[] DomainReceiveMarkers;
3321
3322 /*--- Deallocate the bound variables ---*/
3323
3324 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3325 for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++)
3326 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound] != nullptr) delete bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound];
3327 if (bound[iMarker] != nullptr) delete[] bound[iMarker];
3328 }
3329 delete[] bound;
3330
3331 /*--- Allocate the new bound variables, and set the number of markers ---*/
3332
3333 bound = bound_Copy;
3334 nMarker = nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv;
3335
3336 config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
3337
3338 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3339 nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker];
3340 }
3341
3342 for (iMarker = nMarker_Physical; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3343 Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker];
3344 config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
3345 config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, "SEND_RECEIVE");
3346 }
3347
3348 /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
3349
3350 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3351 string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3352
3353 if (Marker_Tag != "SEND_RECEIVE") {
3354 /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
3355
3356 Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
3357 config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
3358 config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
3359 config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
3360 config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
3361 config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
3362 config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
3363 config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3364 config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
3365 config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
3366 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
3367 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(Marker_Tag));
3368 config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
3369 config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
3370 config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
3371 config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
3372 config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
3373 config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3374 config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_SobolevBC(Marker_Tag));
3375
3376 }
3377
3378 /*--- Send-Receive boundaries definition ---*/
3379
3380 else {
3381 config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, SEND_RECEIVE);
3382 config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, NO);
3383 config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, NO);
3384 config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, NO);
3385 config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, NO);
3386 config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, NO);
3387 config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, NO);
3388 config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, NO);
3389 config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, NO);
3390 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, NO);
3391 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, NO);
3392 config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, NO);
3393 config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, NO);
3394 config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, NO);
3395 config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, NO);
3396 config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, NO);
3397 config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, NO);
3398 config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, NO);
3399
3400 for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3401 if (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0)
3402 nodes->SetDomain(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), false);
3403 }
3404 }
3405
3406 /*--- Loop over the surface element to set the boundaries ---*/
3407
3408 unsigned long Point_Surface, iElem_Surface;
3409 unsigned short iNode_Surface;
3410
3411 for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
3412 for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
3413 Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
3414 nodes->SetBoundary(Point_Surface, nMarker);
3415 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
3416 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
3417 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
3418 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
3419 nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3420
3421 if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetSolidBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3422
3423 if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetViscousBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3424
3425 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3426 }
3427 }
3428 }
3429
3430 delete[] Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
3431 delete[] nElem_Bound_Copy;
3432}
3433
3434void CPhysicalGeometry::Read_Mesh_FVM(CConfig* config, const string& val_mesh_filename, unsigned short val_iZone,
3435 unsigned short val_nZone) {
3436 /*--- Initialize counters for local/global points & elements ---*/
3437
3438 Global_nPoint = 0;
3439 Global_nPointDomain = 0;
3440 Global_nElem = 0;
3441 Global_nElemDomain = 0;
3442 nelem_edge = 0;
3443 Global_nelem_edge = 0;
3444 nelem_triangle = 0;
3445 Global_nelem_triangle = 0;
3446 nelem_quad = 0;
3447 Global_nelem_quad = 0;
3448 nelem_tetra = 0;
3449 Global_nelem_tetra = 0;
3450 nelem_hexa = 0;
3451 Global_nelem_hexa = 0;
3452 nelem_prism = 0;
3453 Global_nelem_prism = 0;
3454 nelem_pyramid = 0;
3455 Global_nelem_pyramid = 0;
3456
3457 /*--- Set the zone number from the input value. ---*/
3458
3459 nZone = val_nZone;
3460
3461 /*--- Create a mesh reader to read a CGNS grid into linear partitions. ---*/
3462
3463 unsigned short val_format = config->GetMesh_FileFormat();
3464
3465 CMeshReaderFVM* MeshFVM = nullptr;
3466 switch (val_format) {
3467 case SU2:
3468 MeshFVM = new CSU2ASCIIMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3469 break;
3470 case CGNS_GRID:
3471 MeshFVM = new CCGNSMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3472 break;
3473 case RECTANGLE:
3474 MeshFVM = new CRectangularMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3475 break;
3476 case BOX:
3477 MeshFVM = new CBoxMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3478 break;
3479 default:
3480 SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized mesh format specified!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3481 break;
3482 }
3483
3484 /*--- Store the dimension of the problem ---*/
3485
3486 nDim = MeshFVM->GetDimension();
3487 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3488 if (nDim == 2) cout << "Two dimensional problem." << endl;
3489 if (nDim == 3) cout << "Three dimensional problem." << endl;
3490 }
3491
3492 /*--- Store the local and global number of nodes for this rank. ---*/
3493
3494 nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
3495 nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
3496 Global_nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
3497 Global_nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
3498
3499 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
3500 cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points before partitioning." << endl;
3501 } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3502 cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points." << endl;
3503 }
3504
3505 /*--- Store the local and global number of interior elements. ---*/
3506
3507 nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalElements();
3508 Global_nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
3509 Global_nElemDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
3510
3511 if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
3512 cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements before partitioning." << endl;
3513 } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3514 cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements." << endl;
3515 }
3516
3517 /*--- Load the grid points, volume elements, and surface elements
3518 from the mesh object into the proper SU2 data structures. ---*/
3519
3520 LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(config, MeshFVM);
3521 LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(config, MeshFVM);
3522 LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(config, MeshFVM);
3523
3524 /*--- Prepare the nodal adjacency structures for ParMETIS. ---*/
3525
3526 PrepareAdjacency(config);
3527
3528 /*--- Now that we have loaded all information from the mesh,
3529 delete the mesh reader object. ---*/
3530
3531 delete MeshFVM;
3532}
3533
3534void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(CConfig* config, CMeshReaderFVM* mesh) {
3535 /*--- Get the linearly partitioned coordinates from the mesh object. ---*/
3536
3537 const auto& gridCoords = mesh->GetLocalPointCoordinates();
3538
3539 /*--- Initialize point counts and the grid node data structure. ---*/
3540
3541 nodes = new CPoint(nPoint, nDim);
3542
3543 /*--- Loop over the CGNS grid nodes and load into the SU2 data
3544 structure. Note that since we have performed a linear partitioning
3545 of the grid nodes, we can simply initialize the global index to
3546 the first node that lies on our rank and increment. ---*/
3547
3548 CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain, 0);
3549 unsigned long GlobalIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
3550 for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3551 for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; ++iDim) nodes->SetCoord(iPoint, iDim, gridCoords[iDim][iPoint]);
3552 nodes->SetGlobalIndex(iPoint, GlobalIndex);
3553 ++GlobalIndex;
3554 }
3555}
3556
3557void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(CConfig* config, CMeshReaderFVM* mesh) {
3558 /*--- Reset the global to local element mapping. ---*/
3559
3560 Global_to_Local_Elem.clear();
3561
3562 /*--- Get the volume connectivity from the mesh object. ---*/
3563
3564 auto& connElems = mesh->GetLocalVolumeElementConnectivity();
3565
3566 /*--- Allocate space for the CGNS interior elements in our SU2 data
3567 structure. Note that we only instantiate our rank's local set. ---*/
3568
3569 elem = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem]();
3570
3571 /*--- Loop over all of the internal, local volumetric elements. ---*/
3572
3573 for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
3574 /*--- Get the global ID for this element. This is stored in
3575 the first entry of our connectivity stucture. ---*/
3576
3577 const auto Global_Index_Elem = connElems[iElem * SU2_CONN_SIZE + 0];
3578 Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
3579
3580 /*--- Get the VTK type for this element. This is stored in the
3581 second entry of the connectivity structure. ---*/
3582
3583 const auto vtk_type = static_cast<int>(connElems[iElem * SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1]);
3584
3585 /*--- Instantiate this element in the proper SU2 data structure.
3586 During this loop, we also set the global to local element map
3587 for later use and increment the element counts for all types. ---*/
3588
3589 auto connectivity = &connElems[iElem * SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP];
3590
3591 switch (vtk_type) {
3592 case TRIANGLE:
3593 elem[iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2]);
3594 nelem_triangle++;
3595 break;
3596
3597 case QUADRILATERAL:
3598 elem[iElem] = new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3]);
3599 nelem_quad++;
3600 break;
3601
3602 case TETRAHEDRON:
3603 elem[iElem] = new CTetrahedron(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3]);
3604 nelem_tetra++;
3605 break;
3606
3607 case HEXAHEDRON:
3608 elem[iElem] = new CHexahedron(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3],
3609 connectivity[4], connectivity[5], connectivity[6], connectivity[7]);
3610 nelem_hexa++;
3611 break;
3612
3613 case PRISM:
3614 elem[iElem] = new CPrism(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3], connectivity[4],
3615 connectivity[5]);
3616 nelem_prism++;
3617 break;
3618
3619 case PYRAMID:
3620 elem[iElem] = new CPyramid(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3], connectivity[4]);
3621 nelem_pyramid++;
3622 break;
3623
3624 default:
3625 SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3626 break;
3627 }
3628 }
3629
3630 /*--- Reduce the global counts of all element types found in
3631 the CGNS grid with all ranks. ---*/
3632
3633 auto reduce = [](unsigned long p, unsigned long& t) {
3634 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&p, &t, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3635 };
3636 reduce(nelem_triangle, Global_nelem_triangle);
3637 reduce(nelem_quad, Global_nelem_quad);
3638 reduce(nelem_hexa, Global_nelem_hexa);
3639 reduce(nelem_tetra, Global_nelem_tetra);
3640 reduce(nelem_prism, Global_nelem_prism);
3641 reduce(nelem_pyramid, Global_nelem_pyramid);
3642}
3643
3644void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(CConfig* config, CMeshReaderFVM* mesh) {
3645 /*--- The master node takes care of loading all markers and
3646 surface elements from the file. This information is later
3647 put into linear partitions to make its redistribution easier
3648 after we call ParMETIS. ---*/
3649
3650 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3651 const vector<string>& sectionNames = mesh->GetMarkerNames();
3652
3653 /*--- Store the number of markers and print to the screen. ---*/
3654
3655 nMarker = mesh->GetNumberOfMarkers();
3656 config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
3657 cout << nMarker << " surface markers." << endl;
3658
3659 /*--- Create the data structure for boundary elements. ---*/
3660
3661 bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker];
3662 nElem_Bound = new unsigned long[nMarker];
3663 Tag_to_Marker = new string[config->GetnMarker_Max()];
3664
3665 /*--- Set some temporaries for the loop below. ---*/
3666
3667 int npe, vtk_type;
3668 unsigned long iElem = 0;
3669 vector<unsigned long> connectivity(N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON);
3670
3671 /*--- Loop over all sections that we extracted from the CGNS file
3672 that were identified as boundary element sections so that we can
3673 store those elements into our SU2 data structures. ---*/
3674
3675 for (int iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3676 /*--- Initialize some counter variables ---*/
3677
3678 nelem_edge_bound = 0;
3679 nelem_triangle_bound = 0;
3680 nelem_quad_bound = 0;
3681 iElem = 0;
3682
3683 /*--- Get the string name for this marker. ---*/
3684
3685 const string& Marker_Tag = sectionNames[iMarker];
3686
3687 /* Get the marker info and surface connectivity from the mesh object. */
3688
3689 const unsigned long surfElems = mesh->GetNumberOfSurfaceElementsForMarker(iMarker);
3690
3691 const vector<unsigned long>& connElems = mesh->GetSurfaceElementConnectivityForMarker(iMarker);
3692
3693 /*--- Set the number of boundary elements in this marker. ---*/
3694
3695 nElem_Bound[iMarker] = surfElems;
3696
3697 /*--- Report the number and name of the marker to the console. ---*/
3698
3699 cout << nElem_Bound[iMarker] << " boundary elements in index ";
3700 cout << iMarker << " (Marker = " << Marker_Tag << ")." << endl;
3701
3702 /*--- Instantiate the list of elements in the data structure. ---*/
3703
3704 bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
3705
3706 for (unsigned long jElem = 0; jElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; jElem++) {
3707 /*--- Not a mixed section. We already know the element type,
3708 which is stored ---*/
3709
3710 vtk_type = (int)connElems[jElem * SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1];
3711
3712 /*--- Store the loop size more easily. ---*/
3713
3714 npe = (int)(SU2_CONN_SIZE - SU2_CONN_SKIP);
3715
3716 /*--- Store the nodes for this element more clearly. ---*/
3717
3718 for (int j = 0; j < npe; j++) {
3719 unsigned long nn = jElem * SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j;
3720 connectivity[j] = connElems[nn];
3721 }
3722
3723 /*--- Instantiate the boundary element object. ---*/
3724
3725 switch (vtk_type) {
3726 case LINE:
3727 bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CLine(connectivity[0], connectivity[1]);
3728 iElem++;
3729 nelem_edge_bound++;
3730 break;
3731 case TRIANGLE:
3732 bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2]);
3733 iElem++;
3734 nelem_triangle_bound++;
3735 break;
3736 case QUADRILATERAL:
3737 bound[iMarker][iElem] =
3738 new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0], connectivity[1], connectivity[2], connectivity[3]);
3739 iElem++;
3740 nelem_quad_bound++;
3741 break;
3742 }
3743 }
3744
3745 /*--- Update config file lists in order to store the boundary
3746 information for this marker in the correct place. ---*/
3747
3748 Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
3749 config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Marker_Tag);
3750 config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
3751 config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
3752 config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
3753 config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
3754 config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
3755 config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
3756 config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3757 config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
3758 config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
3759 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
3760 config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(Marker_Tag));
3761 config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
3762 config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
3763 config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
3764 config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, NONE);
3765 config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
3766 config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
3767 config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3768 config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_SobolevBC(Marker_Tag));
3769 }
3770 }
3771}
3772
3773void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareAdjacency(const CConfig* config) {
3774#ifdef HAVE_MPI
3775#ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
3776
3777 /*--- Resize the vector for the adjacency information (ParMETIS). ---*/
3778
3779 adj_nodes.clear();
3780 adj_nodes.resize(nPoint);
3781
3782 /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
3783 index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
3784
3785 CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain, 0);
3786 const unsigned long firstIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
3787
3788 /*--- Loop over all elements that are now loaded and store adjacency. ---*/
3789
3790 for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
3791 /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
3792 unsigned long connectivity[8] = {0};
3793 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3794 connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
3795 }
3796
3797 /*--- Instantiate this element and build adjacency structure. ---*/
3798
3799 switch (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type()) {
3800 case TRIANGLE:
3801
3802 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3803 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3804 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3805
3806 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; iNode++) {
3807 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3808
3809 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3810 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3811 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3812
3813 for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; jNode++) {
3814 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3815
3816 if (iNode != jNode) adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
3817 }
3818 }
3819 }
3820
3821 break;
3822
3823 case QUADRILATERAL:
3824
3825 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3826 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3827 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3828
3829 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL; iNode++) {
3830 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3831
3832 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3833 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3834 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3835
3836 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3837
3838 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 1) % 4]);
3839 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 3) % 4]);
3840 }
3841 }
3842
3843 break;
3844
3845 case TETRAHEDRON:
3846
3847 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3848 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3849 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3850
3851 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; iNode++) {
3852 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3853
3854 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3855 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3856 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3857
3858 for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; jNode++) {
3859 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3860
3861 if (iNode != jNode) adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
3862 }
3863 }
3864 }
3865
3866 break;
3867
3868 case HEXAHEDRON:
3869
3870 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3871 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3872 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3873
3874 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON; iNode++) {
3875 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3876
3877 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3878 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3879 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3880
3881 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3882
3883 if (iNode < 4) {
3884 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 1) % 4]);
3885 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 3) % 4]);
3886 } else {
3887 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode - 3) % 4 + 4]);
3888 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode - 1) % 4 + 4]);
3889 }
3890 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 4) % 8]);
3891 }
3892 }
3893
3894 break;
3895
3896 case PRISM:
3897
3898 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3899 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3900 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3901
3902 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PRISM; iNode++) {
3903 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3904
3905 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3906 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3907 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3908
3909 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3910
3911 if (iNode < 3) {
3912 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 1) % 3]);
3913 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 2) % 3]);
3914 } else {
3915 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode - 2) % 3 + 3]);
3916 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode - 1) % 3 + 3]);
3917 }
3918 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 3) % 6]);
3919 }
3920 }
3921
3922 break;
3923
3924 case PYRAMID:
3925
3926 /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
3927 in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
3928 global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
3929
3930 for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PYRAMID; iNode++) {
3931 const long local_index = connectivity[iNode] - firstIndex;
3932
3933 if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
3934 /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
3935 Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
3936
3937 /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
3938
3939 if (iNode < 4) {
3940 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 1) % 4]);
3941 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode + 3) % 4]);
3942 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[4]);
3943 } else {
3944 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[0]);
3945 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[1]);
3946 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[2]);
3947 adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[3]);
3948 }
3949 }
3950 }
3951
3952 break;
3953
3954 default:
3955 SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3956 break;
3957 }
3958 }
3959
3960 /*--- Prepare the adjacency information that ParMETIS will need for
3961 completing the graph partitioning in parallel. ---*/
3962
3963 SortAdjacency(config);
3964
3965#endif
3966#endif
3967}
3968
3969void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_IntElem_Orientation(const CConfig* config) {
3970 unsigned long tria_flip = 0, quad_flip = 0, tet_flip = 0, prism_flip = 0, hexa_flip = 0, pyram_flip = 0;
3971 unsigned long quad_error = 0, prism_error = 0, hexa_error = 0, pyram_error = 0;
3972
3973 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(reduction(+ : tria_flip, quad_flip, tet_flip, prism_flip, hexa_flip, pyram_flip)) {
3974 /*--- Lambda to test triangles. Normal should be positive in the z direction (right hand rule). ---*/
3975 auto checkTria = [this](unsigned long iElem, int Node_1, int Node_2, int Node_3) {
3976 const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_1));
3977 const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_2));
3978 const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_3));
3979 constexpr int nDim = 2;
3980 su2double a[nDim] = {0.0}, b[nDim] = {0.0};
3981 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
3982 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
3983 return a[0] * b[1] - a[1] * b[0] < 0.0;
3984 };
3985
3986 /*--- Lambda to test tetrahedrons, volume must be positive,
3987 * the normal of any face must point towards the other point. ---*/
3988 auto checkTetra = [this](unsigned long iElem, int Node_1, int Node_2, int Node_3, int Node_4) {
3989 const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_1));
3990 const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_2));
3991 const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_3));
3992 const auto Coord_4 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_4));
3993 constexpr int nDim = 3;
3994 su2double a[nDim] = {0.0}, b[nDim] = {0.0}, c[nDim] = {0.0}, n[nDim] = {0.0};
3995 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
3996 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
3997 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_4, Coord_1, c);
3998 GeometryToolbox::CrossProduct(a, b, n);
3999 return GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim, n, c) < 0.0;
4000 };
4001
4002 /*--- Loop over all the elements. ---*/
4003
4004 SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nElem, 2 * omp_get_max_threads()))
4005 for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4006 /*--- 2D grid. ---*/
4007
4008 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
4009 if (checkTria(iElem, 0, 1, 2)) {
4010 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4011 tria_flip++;
4012 }
4013 }
4014
4015 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
4016 /*--- Two triangles. ---*/
4017 bool test_1 = checkTria(iElem, 0, 1, 2);
4018 bool test_2 = checkTria(iElem, 0, 2, 3);
4019
4020 if (test_1 && test_2) {
4021 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4022 quad_flip++;
4023 } else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4024 /*--- If one test fails and the other passes the
4025 * element probably has serious problems. ---*/
4026 SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4027 quad_error++;
4028 }
4029 }
4030
4031 /*--- 3D grid. ---*/
4032
4033 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TETRAHEDRON) {
4034 if (checkTetra(iElem, 0, 1, 2, 3)) {
4035 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4036 tet_flip++;
4037 }
4038 }
4039
4040 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PYRAMID) {
4041 /*--- Slice across top vertex into 2 tets. ---*/
4042 bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem, 0, 1, 2, 4);
4043 bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem, 2, 3, 0, 4);
4044
4045 if (test_1 && test_2) {
4046 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4047 pyram_flip++;
4048 } else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4049 SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4050 pyram_error++;
4051 }
4052 }
4053
4054 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PRISM) {
4055 /*--- The triangular faces should point at each other. ---*/
4056 bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem, 0, 2, 1, 3);
4057 bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem, 3, 4, 5, 2);
4058
4059 if (test_1 && test_2) {
4060 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4061 prism_flip++;
4062 } else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4063 SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4064 prism_error++;
4065 }
4066 }
4067
4068 if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == HEXAHEDRON) {
4069 /*--- The base points at the top. ---*/
4070 bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem, 0, 1, 2, 5);
4071 bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem, 0, 2, 3, 7);
4072 /*--- The top points at the base. ---*/
4073 bool test_3 = checkTetra(iElem, 4, 6, 5, 1);
4074 bool test_4 = checkTetra(iElem, 4, 7, 6, 3);
4075
4076 if (test_1 && test_2 && test_3 && test_4) {
4077 elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4078 hexa_flip++;
4079 } else if (test_1 || test_2 || test_3 || test_4) {
4080 SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4081 hexa_error++;
4082 }
4083 }
4084 }
4085 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4086 }
4087 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4088
4089 auto reduce = [](unsigned long& val) {
4090 unsigned long tmp = val;
4091 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&tmp, &val, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4092 };
4093 reduce(tria_flip);
4094 reduce(quad_flip);
4095 reduce(tet_flip);
4096 reduce(pyram_flip);
4097 reduce(prism_flip);
4098 reduce(hexa_flip);
4099 reduce(quad_error);
4100 reduce(pyram_error);
4101 reduce(prism_error);
4102 reduce(hexa_error);
4103
4104 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4105 string start("There has been a re-orientation of ");
4106 if (tria_flip) cout << start << tria_flip << " TRIANGLE volume elements." << endl;
4107 if (quad_flip) cout << start << quad_flip << " QUADRILATERAL volume elements." << endl;
4108 if (tet_flip) cout << start << tet_flip << " TETRAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
4109 if (hexa_flip) cout << start << hexa_flip << " HEXAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
4110 if (pyram_flip) cout << start << pyram_flip << " PYRAMID volume elements." << endl;
4111 if (prism_flip) cout << start << prism_flip << " PRISM volume elements." << endl;
4112
4113 if (quad_error + pyram_error + prism_error + hexa_error) {
4114 cout << ">>> WARNING: ";
4115 if (quad_error) cout << quad_error << " QUADRILATERAL, ";
4116 if (pyram_error) cout << pyram_error << " PYRAMID, ";
4117 if (prism_error) cout << prism_error << " PRISM, ";
4118 if (hexa_error) cout << hexa_error << " HEXAHEDRON, ";
4119 cout << "volume elements are distorted.\n It was not possible "
4120 "to determine if their orientation is correct."
4121 << endl;
4122 }
4123
4124 if (tria_flip + quad_flip + tet_flip + hexa_flip + pyram_flip + prism_flip + quad_error + pyram_error +
4125 prism_error + hexa_error ==
4126 0) {
4127 cout << "All volume elements are correctly orientend." << endl;
4128 }
4129 }
4130}
4131
4132void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_BoundElem_Orientation(const CConfig* config) {
4133 unsigned long line_flip = 0, tria_flip = 0, quad_flip = 0, quad_error = 0;
4134
4135 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(reduction(+ : line_flip, tria_flip, quad_flip, quad_error)) {
4136 /*--- Lambda to test tetrahedrons. ---*/
4137 auto checkTetra = [this](unsigned long Point_1, unsigned long Point_2, unsigned long Point_3,
4138 unsigned long Point_4) {
4139 const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_1);
4140 const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_2);
4141 const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_3);
4142 const auto Coord_4 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_4);
4143 constexpr int nDim = 3;
4144 su2double a[nDim] = {0.0}, b[nDim] = {0.0}, c[nDim] = {0.0}, n[nDim] = {0.0};
4145 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4146 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4147 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_4, Coord_1, c);
4148 GeometryToolbox::CrossProduct(a, b, n);
4149 return GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim, n, c) < 0.0;
4150 };
4151
4152 for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4153 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) continue;
4154
4155 SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4156 for (auto iElem_Surface = 0ul; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
4157 /*--- Pick a reference point inside the domain that is not part of the surface element. ---*/
4158 const auto iElem_Domain = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetDomainElement();
4159 unsigned long Point_Domain = 0;
4160
4161 for (auto iNode_Domain = 0u; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
4162 Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
4163 bool find = false;
4164 for (auto iNode_Surface = 0u; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
4165 auto Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
4166 if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) {
4167 find = true;
4168 break;
4169 }
4170 }
4171 if (!find) break;
4172 }
4173
4174 /*--- 2D grid. ---*/
4175
4176 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE) {
4177 auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4178 auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4179 const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_1_Surface);
4180 const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_2_Surface);
4181 const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_Domain);
4182
4183 /*--- The normal of the triangle formed by the line and domain
4184 * point should point in the positive z direction. ---*/
4185 constexpr int nDim = 2;
4186 su2double a[nDim] = {0.0}, b[nDim] = {0.0};
4187 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4188 GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4189 bool test = a[0] * b[1] - a[1] * b[0] < 0.0;
4190
4191 if (test) {
4192 bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4193 line_flip++;
4194 }
4195 }
4196
4197 /*--- 3D grid. ---*/
4198
4199 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
4200 auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4201 auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4202 auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4203
4204 /*--- The normal of the triangle should point into the domain,
4205 * resulting in a tetrahedron with positive volume. ---*/
4206 if (checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain)) {
4207 bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4208 tria_flip++;
4209 }
4210 }
4211
4212 if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
4213 auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4214 auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4215 auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4216 auto Point_4_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(3);
4217
4218 /*--- Divide quadrilateral/pyramid into triangles/tetrahedrons. ---*/
4219 int test_1 = checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain);
4220 int test_2 = checkTetra(Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_Domain);
4221 int test_3 = checkTetra(Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_Domain);
4222 int test_4 = checkTetra(Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_Domain);
4223
4224 if (test_1 + test_2 + test_3 + test_4 >= 3) {
4225 /*--- If 3 or 4 tests fail there is > 75% chance flipping is the right choice. ---*/
4226 bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4227 quad_flip++;
4228 } else if (test_1 + test_2 + test_3 + test_4 == 2) {
4229 /*--- If 50/50 we cannot be sure of what to do -> report to user.
4230 * If only one test fails it is probably (75%) due to skewness or warping. ---*/
4231 quad_error++;
4232 }
4233 }
4234 }
4235 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4236 }
4237 }
4238 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4239
4240 auto reduce = [](unsigned long& val) {
4241 unsigned long tmp = val;
4242 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&tmp, &val, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4243 };
4244 reduce(line_flip);
4245 reduce(tria_flip);
4246 reduce(quad_flip);
4247 reduce(quad_error);
4248
4249 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4250 string start("There has been a re-orientation of ");
4251 if (line_flip) cout << start << line_flip << " LINE surface elements." << endl;
4252 if (tria_flip) cout << start << tria_flip << " TRIANGLE surface elements." << endl;
4253 if (quad_flip) cout << start << quad_flip << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements." << endl;
4254
4255 if (quad_error) {
4256 cout << ">>> WARNING: " << quad_error
4257 << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements are distorted.\n"
4258 " It was not possible to determine if their orientation is correct."
4259 << endl;
4260 }
4261
4262 if (line_flip + tria_flip + quad_flip + quad_error == 0) {
4263 cout << "All surface elements are correctly orientend." << endl;
4264 }
4265 }
4266}
4267
4268void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPositive_ZArea(CConfig* config) {
4269 unsigned short iMarker, Boundary, Monitoring;
4270 unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4271 su2double *Normal, PositiveXArea, PositiveYArea, PositiveZArea, WettedArea,
4272 CoordX = 0.0, CoordY = 0.0, CoordZ = 0.0, MinCoordX = 1E10, MinCoordY = 1E10, MinCoordZ = 1E10, MaxCoordX = -1E10,
4273 MaxCoordY = -1E10, MaxCoordZ = -1E10, TotalMinCoordX = 1E10, TotalMinCoordY = 1E10, TotalMinCoordZ = 1E10,
4274 TotalMaxCoordX = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordY = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordZ = -1E10;
4275 su2double TotalPositiveXArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveYArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveZArea = 0.0, TotalWettedArea = 0.0,
4276 AxiFactor;
4277
4278 const bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
4279 const bool fea = config->GetStructuralProblem();
4280
4281 PositiveXArea = 0.0;
4282 PositiveYArea = 0.0;
4283 PositiveZArea = 0.0;
4284 WettedArea = 0.0;
4285
4286 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4287 Boundary = config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker);
4288 Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
4289
