4290 if (((config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker) || Boundary == LOAD_BOUNDARY || Boundary == DISPLACEMENT_BOUNDARY) &&
4291 Monitoring == YES) ||
4292 fea) {
4293 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4294 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4295
4296 if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
4297 Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
4298 CoordX = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 0);
4299 CoordY = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4300 if (nDim == 3) CoordZ = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 2);
4301
4302 if (axisymmetric)
4303 AxiFactor = 2.0 * PI_NUMBER * nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4304 else
4305 AxiFactor = 1.0;
4306
4307 WettedArea += AxiFactor * GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
4308
4309 if (Normal[0] < 0) PositiveXArea -= Normal[0];
4310 if (Normal[1] < 0) PositiveYArea -= Normal[1];
4311 if ((nDim == 3) && (Normal[2] < 0)) PositiveZArea -= Normal[2];
4312
4313 if (CoordX < MinCoordX) MinCoordX = CoordX;
4314 if (CoordX > MaxCoordX) MaxCoordX = CoordX;
4315
4316 if (CoordY < MinCoordY) MinCoordY = CoordY;
4317 if (CoordY > MaxCoordY) MaxCoordY = CoordY;
4318
4319 if (nDim == 3) {
4320 if (CoordZ < MinCoordZ) MinCoordZ = CoordZ;
4321 if (CoordZ > MaxCoordZ) MaxCoordZ = CoordZ;
4322 }
4323 }
4324 }
4325 }
4326 }
4327
4328 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveXArea, &TotalPositiveXArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4329 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveYArea, &TotalPositiveYArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4330 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveZArea, &TotalPositiveZArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4331
4332 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordX, &TotalMinCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4333 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordY, &TotalMinCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4334 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordZ, &TotalMinCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4335
4336 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordX, &TotalMaxCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4337 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordY, &TotalMaxCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4338 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordZ, &TotalMaxCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4339
4340 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&WettedArea, &TotalWettedArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4341
4342 /*--- Set a reference area if no value is provided ---*/
4343
4344 const string L = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) ? " m" : " ft";
4345 const string A = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) ? " m^2" : " ft^2";
4346 const bool D3 = (nDim == 3);
4347
4348 if (config->GetRefArea() == 0.0) {
4349 if (D3)
4350 config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveZArea);
4351 else
4352 config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveYArea);
4353
4354 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4355 if (D3)
4356 cout << "Reference area = " << TotalPositiveZArea << A << ".\n";
4357 else
4358 cout << "Reference length = " << TotalPositiveYArea << L << ".\n";
4359 }
4360 }
4361
4362 /*--- Set a semi-span value if no value is provided ---*/
4363
4364 if (config->GetSemiSpan() == 0.0) {
4365 if (D3)
4366 config->SetSemiSpan(fabs(TotalMaxCoordY));
4367 else
4368 config->SetSemiSpan(1.0);
4369
4370 if (D3 && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
4371 cout << "Semi-span length = " << TotalMaxCoordY << L << ".\n";
4372 }
4373 }
4374
4375 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4376 if (fea)
4377 cout << "Surface area = " << TotalWettedArea;
4378 else
4379 cout << "Wetted area = " << TotalWettedArea;
4380 if (D3 || axisymmetric)
4381 cout << A << ".\n";
4382 else
4383 cout << L << ".\n";
4384
4385 cout << "Area projection in the x-plane = " << TotalPositiveXArea << (D3 ? A : L);
4386 cout << ", y-plane = " << TotalPositiveYArea << (D3 ? A : L);
4387 if (D3) cout << ", z-plane = " << TotalPositiveZArea << A;
4388 cout << ".\n";
4389
4390 cout << "Max. coordinate in the x-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordX << L;
4391 cout << ", y-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordY << L;
4392 if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = " << TotalMaxCoordZ << L;
4393 cout << ".\n";
4394
4395 cout << "Min. coordinate in the x-direction = " << TotalMinCoordX << L;
4396 cout << ", y-direction = " << TotalMinCoordY << L;
4397 if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = " << TotalMinCoordZ << L;
4398 cout << "." << endl;
4399 }
4400}
4401
4402void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPoint_Connectivity() {
4403 vector<vector<unsigned long> > points(nPoint);
4404
4405 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
4406 unsigned short Node_Neighbor, iNode, iNeighbor;
4407 unsigned long jElem, Point_Neighbor, iPoint, iElem;
4408
4409 /*--- Loop over all the elements ---*/
4410 BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS {
4411 vector<vector<long> > elems(nPoint);
4412
4413 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4414 /*--- Loop over all the nodes of an element ---*/
4415 for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4416 iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4417 elems[iPoint].push_back(iElem);
4418 }
4419 }
4420 nodes->SetElems(elems);
4421 }
4422 END_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
4423
4424 /*--- Loop over all the points ---*/
4425
4426 SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint, 2 * omp_get_max_threads()))
4427 for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4428 /*--- Loop over all elements shared by the point ---*/
4429
4430 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(iPoint); iElem++) {
4431 jElem = nodes->GetElem(iPoint, iElem);
4432
4433 /*--- If we find the point iPoint in the surrounding element ---*/
4434
4435 for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[jElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4436 if (elem[jElem]->GetNode(iNode) != iPoint) continue;
4437
4438 /*--- Localize the local index of the neighbor of iPoint in the element ---*/
4439
4440 for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < elem[jElem]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor++) {
4441 Node_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor);
4442 Point_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNode(Node_Neighbor);
4443
4444 /*--- Store the point into the point, if it is new ---*/
4445 auto End = points[iPoint].end();
4446 if (find(points[iPoint].begin(), End, Point_Neighbor) == End) points[iPoint].push_back(Point_Neighbor);
4447 }
4448 }
4449 }
4450
4451 /*--- Set the number of neighbors variable, this is important for JST and multigrid in parallel. ---*/
4452 nodes->SetnNeighbor(iPoint, points[iPoint].size());
4453 }
4454 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4455
4456 SU2_OMP_MASTER
4457 nodes->SetPoints(points);
4458 END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4459 }
4460 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4461}
4462
4463void CPhysicalGeometry::SetRCM_Ordering(CConfig* config) {
4464 /*--- The result is the RCM ordering, during the process it is also used as
4465 * the queue of new points considered by the algorithm. This is possible
4466 * because points move from the front of the queue to the back of the result,
4467 * which is equivalent to incrementing an integer marking the end of the
4468 * result and the start of the queue. ---*/
4469 vector<char> InQueue(nPoint, false);
4470 vector<unsigned long> AuxQueue, Result;
4471 Result.reserve(nPoint);
4472 unsigned long QueueStart = 0;
4473
4474 /*--- Exclude halo nodes from the ordering process. ---*/
4475 for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4476 InQueue[iPoint] = true;
4477 }
4478
4479 /*--- Repeat as many times as necessary to handle disconnected graphs. ---*/
4480 while (Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4481 /*--- Select the node with the lowest degree in the grid. ---*/
4482 auto AddPoint = nPoint;
4483 auto MinDegree = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
4484 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4485 auto Degree = nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint);
4486 if (!InQueue[iPoint] && Degree < MinDegree) {
4487 MinDegree = Degree;
4488 AddPoint = iPoint;
4489 }
4490 }
4491 if (AddPoint == nPoint) {
4492 SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4493 }
4494
4495 /*--- Seed the queue with the minimum degree node. ---*/
4496 Result.push_back(AddPoint);
4497 InQueue[AddPoint] = true;
4498
4499 /*--- Loop until reorganizing all nodes connected to AddPoint. This will
4500 * also terminate early once the ordering + queue include all points. ---*/
4501 while (QueueStart < Result.size() && Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4502 /*--- Move the start of the queue, equivalent to taking from the front of
4503 * the queue and inserting at the end of the result. ---*/
4504 AddPoint = Result[QueueStart];
4505 ++QueueStart;
4506
4507 /*--- Add all adjacent nodes to the queue in increasing order of their
4508 degree, checking if the element is already in the queue. ---*/
4509 AuxQueue.clear();
4510 for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < nodes->GetnPoint(AddPoint); iNode++) {
4511 const auto AdjPoint = nodes->GetPoint(AddPoint, iNode);
4512 if (!InQueue[AdjPoint]) {
4513 AuxQueue.push_back(AdjPoint);
4514 InQueue[AdjPoint] = true;
4515 }
4516 }
4517 if (AuxQueue.empty()) continue;
4518
4519 /*--- Sort the auxiliar queue based on the number of neighbors (degree). ---*/
4520 stable_sort(AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end(), [&](unsigned long iPoint, unsigned long jPoint) {
4521 return nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint) < nodes->GetnPoint(jPoint);
4522 });
4523 Result.insert(Result.end(), AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end());
4524 }
4525 }
4526 reverse(Result.begin(), Result.end());
4527
4528 /*--- Check that all the points have been added ---*/
4529 for (const auto status : InQueue) {
4530 if (!status) SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4531 }
4532
4533 /*--- Add the MPI points ---*/
4534 for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4535 Result.push_back(iPoint);
4536 }
4537
4538 /*--- Reset old data structures ---*/
4539
4540 nodes->ResetElems();
4541 nodes->ResetPoints();
4542
4543 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4544 nodes->ResetBoundary(iPoint);
4545 nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(iPoint, false);
4546 nodes->SetSolidBoundary(iPoint, false);
4547 nodes->SetViscousBoundary(iPoint, false);
4548 nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(iPoint, false);
4549 nodes->SetDomain(iPoint, true);
4550 }
4551
4552 /*--- Set the new coordinates ---*/
4553
4554 su2activematrix AuxCoord(nPoint, nDim);
4555 vector<unsigned long> AuxGlobalIndex(nPoint);
4556
4557 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4558 AuxGlobalIndex[iPoint] = nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4559 for (auto iDim = 0u; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4560 AuxCoord(iPoint, iDim) = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, iDim);
4561 }
4562 }
4563
4564 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4565 nodes->SetGlobalIndex(iPoint, AuxGlobalIndex[Result[iPoint]]);
4566 nodes->SetCoord(iPoint, AuxCoord[Result[iPoint]]);
4567 }
4568
4569 /*--- Set the new conectivities ---*/
4570
4571 auto& InvResult = AuxGlobalIndex; // alias to re-use storage
4572 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4573 InvResult[Result[iPoint]] = iPoint;
4574 }
4575
4576 for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4577 for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4578 auto iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4579 elem[iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4580 }
4581 }
4582
4583 for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4584 for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
4585 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE && config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0) {
4586 nodes->SetDomain(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(0), false);
4587 }
4588
4589 for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4590 auto iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4591 bound[iMarker][iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4592 nodes->SetBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], nMarker);
4593 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
4594 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
4595 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
4596 config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4597 nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4598
4599 if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetSolidBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4600
4601 if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) nodes->SetViscousBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4602
4603 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4604 nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4605 }
4606 }
4607 }
4608}
4609
4610void CPhysicalGeometry::SetElement_Connectivity() {
4611 unsigned short first_elem_face, second_elem_face, iFace, iNode, jElem;
4612 unsigned long face_point, Test_Elem, iElem;
4613
4614 /*--- Loop over all the elements, faces and nodes ---*/
4615
4616 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++)
4617 for (iFace = 0; iFace < elem[iElem]->GetnFaces(); iFace++)
4618 for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodesFace(iFace); iNode++) {
4619 face_point = elem[iElem]->GetNode(elem[iElem]->GetFaces(iFace, iNode));
4620
4621 /*--- Loop over all elements sharing the face point ---*/
4622
4623 for (jElem = 0; jElem < nodes->GetnElem(face_point); jElem++) {
4624 Test_Elem = nodes->GetElem(face_point, jElem);
4625
4626 /*--- If it is a new element in this face ---*/
4627
4628 if ((elem[iElem]->GetNeighbor_Elements(iFace) == -1) && (iElem < Test_Elem) &&
4629 FindFace(iElem, Test_Elem, first_elem_face, second_elem_face)) {
4630 /*--- Localice which faces are sharing both elements ---*/
4631
4632 elem[iElem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(Test_Elem, first_elem_face);
4633
4634 /*--- Store the element for both elements ---*/
4635
4636 elem[Test_Elem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(iElem, second_elem_face);
4637 }
4638 }
4639 }
4640}
4641
4642void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundVolume() {
4643 unsigned short cont, iMarker, iElem, iNode_Domain, iNode_Surface;
4644 unsigned long Point_Domain, Point_Surface, Point, iElem_Surface, iElem_Domain;
4645 bool CheckVol;
4646
4647 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4648 for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
4649 /*--- Choose and arbitrary point from the surface --*/
4650 Point = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4651 CheckVol = false;
4652
4653 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(Point); iElem++) {
4654 /*--- Look for elements surronding that point --*/
4655 cont = 0;
4656 iElem_Domain = nodes->GetElem(Point, iElem);
4657 for (iNode_Domain = 0; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
4658 Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
4659 for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
4660 Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
4661 if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) cont++;
4662 if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4663 }
4664 if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4665 }
4666
4667 if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) {
4668 bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->SetDomainElement(iElem_Domain);
4669 CheckVol = true;
4670 break;
4671 }
4672 }
4673 if (!CheckVol) {
4674 char buf[100];
4675 SPRINTF(buf, "The surface element (%u, %lu) doesn't have an associated volume element", iMarker, iElem_Surface);
4676 SU2_MPI::Error(buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4677 }
4678 }
4679}
4680
4681void CPhysicalGeometry::SetVertex(const CConfig* config) {
4682 unsigned long iPoint, iVertex, iElem;
4683 unsigned short iMarker, iNode;
4684
4685 /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node of the grid ---*/
4686
4687 for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
4688 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
4689
4690 /*--- Create and compute the vector with the number of vertex per marker ---*/
4691
4692 nVertex = new unsigned long[nMarker];
4693 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4694 /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
4695
4696 nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
4697 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
4698 for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4699 iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4700
4701 /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
4702
4703 if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
4704 nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
4705 nVertex[iMarker]++;
4706 }
4707 }
4708 }
4709
4710 /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node, the previous result is deleted ---*/
4711
4712 for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
4713 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
4714
4715 /*--- Create the bound vertex structure, note that the order
4716 is the same as in the input file, this is important for Send/Receive part ---*/
4717
4718 vertex = new CVertex**[nMarker];
4719 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4720 vertex[iMarker] = new CVertex*[nVertex[iMarker]];
4721 nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
4722
4723 /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
4724
4725 for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
4726 for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4727 iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4728
4729 /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
4730
4731 if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
4732 iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
4733 vertex[iMarker][iVertex] = new CVertex(iPoint, nDim);
4734
4735 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) {
4736 vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetRotation_Type());
4737 }
4738 nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
4739 nVertex[iMarker]++;
4740 }
4741 }
4742 }
4743}
4744
4745void CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeNSpan(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
4746 bool allocate) {
4747 unsigned short iMarker, jMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan;
4748 unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
4749 long jVertex;
4750 int nSpan, nSpan_loc;
4751 su2double *coord, *valueSpan, min, max, radius, delta;
4752 short PeriodicBoundary;
4753 unsigned short SpanWise_Kind = config->GetKind_SpanWise();
4754
4755 unsigned short iSize;
4756 int nSpan_max;
4757 su2double MyMin, MyMax;
4758
4759 nSpan = 0;
4760 nSpan_loc = 0;
4761 if (nDim == 2) {
4762 nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = 1;
4763 // TODO (turbo) make it more genral
4764 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) config->SetnSpanWiseSections(1);
4765
4766 /*---Initilize the vector of span-wise values that will be ordered ---*/
4767 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = new su2double[1];
4768 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < 1; iSpan++) {
4769 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = 0;
4770 }
4771 } else {
4772 if (SpanWise_Kind == AUTOMATIC) {
4773 /*--- loop to find inflow of outflow marker---*/
4774 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4775 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4776 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4777 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4778
4779 /*--- loop to find the vertex that ar both of inflow or outflow marker and on the periodic
4780 * in order to caount the number of Span ---*/
4781 for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4782 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4783
4784 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4785 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4786 if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4787
4788 PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4789 jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4790
4791 if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4792 nSpan++;
4793 }
4794 }
4795 }
4796 }
4797 }
4798
4799 /*--- storing the local number of span---*/
4800 nSpan_loc = nSpan;
4801 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4802 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan_max, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4803
4804 /*--- initialize the vector that will contain the disordered values span-wise ---*/
4805 nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = nSpan;
4806 valueSpan = new su2double[nSpan];
4807
4808 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++) {
4809 valueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
4810 }
4811
4812 /*--- store the local span-wise value for each processor ---*/
4813 nSpan_loc = 0;
4814 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4815 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4816 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4817 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4818
4819 for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4820 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4821
4822 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4823 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4824 if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4825
4826 PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4827 jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4828
4829 if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4830 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4831 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
4832 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
4833 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
4834 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4835 break;
4836 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
4837 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4838 break;
4839 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
4840 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4841 break;
4842 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
4843 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4844 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4845 } else {
4846 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4847 }
4848 break;
4849 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
4850 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
4851 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
4852 } else {
4853 valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
4854 }
4855 break;
4856 }
4857 nSpan_loc++;
4858 }
4859 }
4860 }
4861 }
4862 }
4863
4864 /*--- Gather the span-wise values on all the processor ---*/
4865
4866 vector<su2double> MyTotValueSpan(nSpan_max * size, -1001.0);
4867 vector<su2double> MyValueSpan(nSpan_max, -1001.0);
4868 vector<int> My_nSpan_loc(size);
4869
4870 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan_loc; iSpan++) {
4871 MyValueSpan[iSpan] = valueSpan[iSpan];
4872 }
4873
4874 SU2_MPI::Allgather(MyValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE, MyTotValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE,
4875 SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4876 SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nSpan_loc, 1, MPI_INT, My_nSpan_loc.data(), 1, MPI_INT, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4877
4878 jSpan = 0;
4879 for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
4880 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < My_nSpan_loc[iSize]; iSpan++) {
4881 valueSpan[jSpan] = MyTotValueSpan[iSize * nSpan_max + iSpan];
4882 jSpan++;
4883 }
4884 }
4885 if (jSpan != nSpan) SU2_MPI::Error("Panic!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4886
4887 /*--- Terrible stuff to do but so is this entire bloody function goodness me... ---*/
4888 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = valueSpan;
4889
4890 sort(SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1], SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] + nSpan);
4891
4892 /*--- Find the minimum value among the span-wise values ---*/
4893 min = SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][0];
4894 }
4895 /*--- Compute equispaced Span-wise sections using number of section specified by the User---*/
4896 else {
4897 /*--- Initialize number of span---*/
4898 nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] = config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User();
4899 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1] = new su2double[config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User()];
4900 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User(); iSpan++) {
4901 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = 0;
4902 }
4903 /*--- Compute maximum and minimum value span-wise---*/
4904 min = 1E+07;
4905 max = -1E+07;
4906 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4907 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
4908 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
4909 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
4910
4911 for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++) {
4912 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
4913
4914 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4915 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4916 if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4917
4918 PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
4919 jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
4920
4921 if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))) {
4922 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4923 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
4924 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
4925 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
4926 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
4927 if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4928 if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4929 break;
4930 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
4931 if (radius < min) min = radius;
4932 if (radius > max) max = radius;
4933 break;
4934 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
4935 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4936 if (radius < min) min = radius;
4937 if (radius > max) max = radius;
4938 } else {
4939 if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4940 if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4941 }
4942 break;
4943 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
4944 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
4945 if (radius < min) min = radius;
4946 if (radius > max) max = radius;
4947 } else {
4948 if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
4949 if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
4950 }
4951 break;
4952 }
4953 }
4954 }
4955 }
4956 }
4957 }
4958 /*--- compute global minimum and maximum value on span-wise ---*/
4959 MyMin = min;
4960 min = 0;
4961 MyMax = max;
4962 max = 0;
4963 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &min, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4964 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &max, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4965
4966 /*--- compute height value for each spanwise section---*/
4967 delta = (max - min) / (nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] - 1);
4968 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
4969 SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan] = min + delta * iSpan;
4970 }
4971 }
4972
4973 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
4974 if (nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW - 1] != nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]) {
4975 char buf[100];
4976 SPRINTF(buf, "nSpan inflow %u, nSpan outflow %u", nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW - 1],
4977 nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]);
4978 SU2_MPI::Error(
4979 string(" At the moment only turbomachinery with the same amount of span-wise section can be simulated\n") +
4980 buf,
4981 CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4982 } else {
4983 config->SetnSpanWiseSections(nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]);
4984 }
4985 }
4986 }
4987}
4988
4989void CPhysicalGeometry::SetTurboVertex(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
4990 bool allocate) {
4991 unsigned long iPoint, **ordered, **disordered, **oldVertex3D, iInternalVertex;
4992 unsigned long nVert, nVertMax;
4993 unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan, iDim;
4994 su2double min, minInt, max, *coord, dist, Normal2, *TurboNormal, *NormalArea, target = 0.0, **area, ***unitnormal,
4995 Area = 0.0;
4996 bool** checkAssign;
4997 min = 10.0E+06;
4998 minInt = 10.0E+06;
4999 max = -10.0E+06;
5000
5001 su2double radius;
5002 long iVertex, iSpanVertex, jSpanVertex, kSpanVertex = 0;
5003 int *nTotVertex_gb, *nVertexSpanHalo;
5004 su2double **x_loc, **y_loc, **z_loc, **angCoord_loc, **deltaAngCoord_loc, **angPitch, **deltaAngPitch,
5005 *minIntAngPitch, *minAngPitch, *maxAngPitch;
5006 int** rank_loc;
5007#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5008 unsigned short iSize, kSize = 0, jSize;
5009 su2double MyMin, MyIntMin, MyMax;
5010 su2double *x_gb = nullptr, *y_gb = nullptr, *z_gb = nullptr, *angCoord_gb = nullptr, *deltaAngCoord_gb = nullptr;
5011 bool* checkAssign_gb = nullptr;
5012 unsigned long My_nVert;
5013
5014#endif
5015 string multizone_filename;
5016
5017 x_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5018 y_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5019 z_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5020 angCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5021 deltaAngCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5022 angPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5023 deltaAngPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5024 rank_loc = new int*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5025 minAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5026 minIntAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5027 maxAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5028
5029 nTotVertex_gb = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5030 nVertexSpanHalo = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5031 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5032 nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = -1;
5033 nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5034 minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5035 minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5036 maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5037 }
5038
5039 /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
5040 TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
5041 NormalArea = new su2double[3];
5042 ordered = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5043 disordered = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5044 oldVertex3D = new unsigned long*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5045 area = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5046 unitnormal = new su2double**[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5047 checkAssign = new bool*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5048
5049 /*--- Initialize the new Vertex structure. The if statement ensures that these vectors are initialized
5050 * only once even if the routine is called more than once.---*/
5051
5052 if (allocate) {
5053 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5054 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5055 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5056 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5057 nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker] = nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
5058 nVertexSpan[iMarker] = new long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5059 turbovertex[iMarker] = new CTurboVertex**[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5060 nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] = new unsigned long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5061 MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5062 MinAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5063 MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]];
5064 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5065 nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5066 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = nullptr;
5067 MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5068 MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5069 MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5070 }
5071 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5072 nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5073 }
5074 }
5075 }
5076 }
5077 }
5078 }
5079
5080 // this works only for turbomachinery rotating around the Z-Axes.
5081 // the reordering algorithm pitch-wise assumes that X-coordinate of each boundary vertex is positive so that
5082 // reordering can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5083 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5084 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5085 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5086 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5087 /*--- compute the amount of vertexes for each span-wise section to initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and
5088 * auxiliary pointers ---*/
5089 for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5090 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5091 if (nDim == 3) {
5092 dist = 10E+06;
5093 jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5094 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5095
5096 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5097 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5098 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5099 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5100 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5101 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5102 jSpan = iSpan;
5103 }
5104 }
5105 break;
5106 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5107 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5108 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5109 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5110 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5111 jSpan = iSpan;
5112 }
5113 }
5114 break;
5115 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5116 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5117 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5118 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5119 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5120 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5121 jSpan = iSpan;
5122 }
5123 }
5124 } else {
5125 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5126 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5127 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5128 jSpan = iSpan;
5129 }
5130 }
5131 }
5132 break;
5133
5134 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5135 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5136 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5137 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5138 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5139 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5140 jSpan = iSpan;
5141 }
5142 }
5143 } else {
5144 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5145 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5146 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5147 jSpan = iSpan;
5148 }
5149 }
5150 }
5151 break;
5152 }
5153 }
5154
5155 /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5156 else {
5157 jSpan = 0;
5158 }
5159
5160 if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5161 nVertexSpan[iMarker][jSpan]++;
5162 }
5163 nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5164 }
5165
5166 /*--- initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
5167 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5168 if (allocate) {
5169 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = new CTurboVertex*[nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]];
5170 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5171 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex] = nullptr;
5172 }
5173 }
5174 ordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5175 disordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5176 oldVertex3D[iSpan] = new unsigned long[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5177 checkAssign[iSpan] = new bool[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5178 area[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5179 unitnormal[iSpan] = new su2double*[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5180 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5181 unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex] = new su2double[nDim];
5182 }
5183 angPitch[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5184 deltaAngPitch[iSpan] = new su2double[nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5185 nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5186 }
5187
5188 /*--- store the vertexes in a ordered manner in span-wise directions but not yet ordered pitch-wise ---*/
5189 for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5190 iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5191 if (nDim == 3) {
5192 dist = 10E+06;
5193 jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5194
5195 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5196 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5197 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5198 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5199 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5200 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5201 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5202 jSpan = iSpan;
5203 }
5204 }
5205 break;
5206 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5207 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5208 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5209 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5210 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5211 jSpan = iSpan;
5212 }
5213 }
5214 break;
5215 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5216 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5217 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5218 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5219 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5220 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5221 jSpan = iSpan;
5222 }
5223 }
5224 } else {
5225 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5226 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5227 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5228 jSpan = iSpan;
5229 }
5230 }
5231 }
5232 break;
5233
5234 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5235 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5236 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5237 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5238 if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5239 dist = abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5240 jSpan = iSpan;
5241 }
5242 }
5243 } else {
5244 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5245 if (dist > (abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]))) {
5246 dist = abs(coord[2] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]);
5247 jSpan = iSpan;
5248 }
5249 }
5250 }
5251 break;
5252 }
5253 }
5254 /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5255 else {
5256 jSpan = 0;
5257 }
5258 /*--- compute the face area associated with the vertex ---*/
5259 vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(NormalArea);
5260 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] = -NormalArea[iDim];
5261 Area = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, NormalArea);
5262
5263 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] /= Area;
5264 /*--- store all the all the info into the auxiliary containers ---*/
5265 disordered[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iPoint;
5266 oldVertex3D[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iVertex;
5267 area[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = Area;
5268 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5269 unitnormal[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]][iDim] = NormalArea[iDim];
5270 }
5271 checkAssign[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = false;
5272 nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5273 }
5274
5275 /*--- using the auxiliary container reordered the vertexes pitch-wise direction at each span ---*/
5276 // the reordering algorithm can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5277 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5278 /*--- find the local minimum and maximum pitch-wise for each processor---*/
5279 min = 10E+06;
5280 minInt = 10E+06;
5281 max = -10E+06;
5282 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5283 iPoint = disordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5284 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5285 /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among all nodes---*/
5286 if (coord[1] < min) {
5287 min = coord[1];
5288 if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5289 MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5290 } else {
5291 MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5292 }
5293 minAngPitch[iSpan] = MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5294 kSpanVertex = iSpanVertex;
5295 }
5296
5297 /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5298 if (coord[1] < minInt) {
5299 if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5300 minInt = coord[1];
5301 if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5302 minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = coord[1];
5303 } else {
5304 minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5305 }
5306 }
5307 }
5308
5309 /*--- find nodes at maximum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5310 if (coord[1] > max) {
5311 if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
5312 max = coord[1];
5313 if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5314 MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5315 } else {
5316 MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5317 }
5318 maxAngPitch[iSpan] = MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5319 }
5320 }
5321 }
5322
5323 iInternalVertex = 0;
5324
5325 /*--- reordering the vertex pitch-wise, store the ordered vertexes span-wise and pitch-wise---*/
5326 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5327 dist = 10E+06;
5328 ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = disordered[iSpan][kSpanVertex];
5329 checkAssign[iSpan][kSpanVertex] = true;
5330 coord = nodes->GetCoord(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5331 target = coord[1];
5332 if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL) {
5333 angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
5334 } else {
5335 angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = atan(coord[1] / coord[0]);
5336 }
5337 if (iSpanVertex == 0) {
5338 deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
5339 } else {
5340 deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] - angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex - 1];
5341 }
5342 /*---create turbovertex structure only for the internal nodes---*/
5343 if (nodes->GetDomain(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex])) {
5344 if (allocate) {
5345 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex] = new CTurboVertex(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex], nDim);
5346 }
5347 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetArea(area[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5348 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetNormal(unitnormal[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5349 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetOldVertex(oldVertex3D[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5350 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetAngularCoord(angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5351 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetDeltaAngularCoord(deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5352 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5353 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5354 Normal2 = 0.0;
5355 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5356 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5357 TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5358 TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5359 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5360 } else {
5361 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5362 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5363 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5364 }
5365 break;
5366 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5367 Normal2 = 0.0;
5368 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5369 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5370 TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5371 TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5372 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5373 } else {
5374 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5375 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5376 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5377 }
5378 break;
5379 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5380 Normal2 = 0.0;
5381 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5382 if (nDim == 3) {
5383 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5384 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5385 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5386 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5387 } else {
5388 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5389 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5390 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5391 }
5392 } else {
5393 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5394 TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
5395 TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5396 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5397 } else {
5398 TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
5399 TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5400 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5401 }
5402 }
5403
5404 break;
5405 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5406 Normal2 = 0.0;
5407 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5408 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5409 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5410 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5411 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5412 } else {
5413 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5414 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5415 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5416 }
5417 break;
5418
5419 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5420 Normal2 = 0.0;
5421 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5422 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5423 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5424 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5425 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5426 } else {
5427 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5428 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5429 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5430 }
5431 break;
5432 }
5433 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5434 iInternalVertex++;
5435 }
5436
5437 for (jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++) {
5438 coord = nodes->GetCoord(disordered[iSpan][jSpanVertex]);
5439 if (dist >= (coord[1] - target) && !checkAssign[iSpan][jSpanVertex] && (coord[1] - target) >= 0.0) {
5440 dist = coord[1] - target;
5441 kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
5442 }
5443 }
5444 }
5445 }
5446
5447 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5448 delete[] ordered[iSpan];
5449 delete[] disordered[iSpan];
5450 delete[] oldVertex3D[iSpan];
5451 delete[] checkAssign[iSpan];
5452 delete[] area[iSpan];
5453 delete[] angPitch[iSpan];
5454 delete[] deltaAngPitch[iSpan];
5455
5456 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5457 delete[] unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex];
5458 }
5459 delete[] unitnormal[iSpan];
5460 }
5461 }
5462 }
5463 }
5464 }
5465
5466 /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5467 nVertMax = 0;
5468
5469 /*--- compute global max and min pitch per span ---*/
5470 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5471 nVert = 0;
5472
5473#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5474 MyMin = minAngPitch[iSpan];
5475 minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5476 MyIntMin = minIntAngPitch[iSpan];
5477 minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5478 MyMax = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
5479 maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+6;
5480
5481 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &minAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5482 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyIntMin, &minIntAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5483 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &maxAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5484#endif
5485
5486 /*--- compute the relative angular pitch with respect to the minimum value ---*/
5487
5488 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5489 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5490 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5491 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5492 nVert = nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
5493 MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minAngPitch[iSpan];
5494 MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
5495 MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minIntAngPitch[iSpan] - minAngPitch[iSpan];
5496 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5497 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetRelAngularCoord(MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan]);
5498 }
5499 }
5500 }
5501 }
5502 }
5503
5504#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5505 My_nVert = nVert;
5506 nVert = 0;
5507 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_nVert, &nVert, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5508#endif
5509
5510 /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5511 if (nVert > nVertMax) {
5512 SetnVertexSpanMax(marker_flag, nVert);
5513 }
5514 /*--- for all the processor should be known the amount of total turbovertex per span ---*/
5515 nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = (int)nVert;
5516
5517 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5518 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5519 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5520 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5521 nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = nVert;
5522 nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] += nVert;
5523 }
5524 }
5525 }
5526 }
5527 }
5528
5529 /*--- Printing Tec file to check the global ordering of the turbovertex pitch-wise ---*/
5530 /*--- Send all the info to the MASTERNODE ---*/
5531
5532 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5533 x_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5534 y_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5535 z_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5536 angCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5537 deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5538 rank_loc[iSpan] = new int[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5539 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5540 x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5541 y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5542 z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5543 angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5544 deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5545 rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1;
5546 }
5547 }
5548
5549 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5550 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5551 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5552 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5553 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5554 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5555 iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
5556 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5557 x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[0];
5558 y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
5559 if (nDim == 3) {
5560 z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[2];
5561 } else {
5562 z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
5563 }
5564 angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetRelAngularCoord();
5565 deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetDeltaAngularCoord();
5566 }
5567 }
5568 }
5569 }
5570 }
5571 }
5572
5573#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5574
5575 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5576 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5577 x_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5578 y_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5579 z_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5580 angCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5581 deltaAngCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5582 checkAssign_gb = new bool[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] * size];
5583
5584 for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
5585 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5586 checkAssign_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + iSpanVertex] = false;
5587 }
5588 }
5589 }
5590 SU2_MPI::Gather(y_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, y_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5591 SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5592 SU2_MPI::Gather(x_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, x_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5593 SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5594 SU2_MPI::Gather(z_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, z_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE,
5595 SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5596 SU2_MPI::Gather(angCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, angCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan],
5597 MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5598 SU2_MPI::Gather(deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, deltaAngCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan],
5599 MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5600
5601 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5602 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5603 x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5604 y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5605 z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5606 angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5607 deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5608 }
5609
5610 min = 10.0E+06;
5611 for (iSize = 0; iSize < size; iSize++) {
5612 if (angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] < min && angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] >= 0.0) {
5613 kSize = iSize;
5614 min = angCoord_gb[iSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5615 }
5616 }
5617
5618 kSpanVertex = 0;
5619 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5620 x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = x_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5621 y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = y_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5622 z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = z_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5623 angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angCoord_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5624 deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = deltaAngCoord_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5625 rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = kSize;
5626 target = angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5627 checkAssign_gb[kSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex] = true;
5628 min = 10.0E+06;
5629 for (jSize = 0; jSize < size; jSize++) {
5630 for (jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++) {
5631 if ((angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] < min) &&
5632 (angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] >= target) &&
5633 !checkAssign_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex]) {
5634 kSize = jSize;
5635 kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
5636 min = angCoord_gb[jSize * nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex];
5637 }
5638 }
5639 }
5640 }
5641
5642 delete[] x_gb;
5643 delete[] y_gb;
5644 delete[] z_gb;
5645 delete[] angCoord_gb;
5646 delete[] deltaAngCoord_gb;
5647 delete[] checkAssign_gb;
5648 }
5649 }
5650
5651#endif
5652
5653 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5654 if (marker_flag == INFLOW && val_iZone == 0) {
5655 std::string sPath = "TURBOMACHINERY";
5656 int nError = 0;
5657#if defined(_WIN32)
5658#ifdef __MINGW32__
5659 nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // MINGW on Windows
5660#else
5661 nError = _mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // can be used on Windows
5662#endif
5663#else
5664 mode_t nMode = 0733; // UNIX style permissions
5665 nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str(), nMode); // can be used on non-Windows
5666#endif
5667 if (nError != 0) {
5668 cout << "TURBOMACHINERY folder creation failed." << endl;
5669 }
5670 }
5671 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5672 multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_inflow.dat";
5673 } else {
5674 multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_outflow.dat";
5675 }
5676 char buffer[50];
5677
5678 if (GetnZone() > 1) {
5679 unsigned short lastindex = multizone_filename.find_last_of('.');
5680 multizone_filename = multizone_filename.substr(0, lastindex);
5681 SPRINTF(buffer, "_%d.dat", SU2_TYPE::Int(val_iZone));
5682 multizone_filename.append(string(buffer));
5683 }
5684
5685 // File to print the vector x_loc, y_loc, z_loc, globIdx_loc to check vertex ordering
5686 ofstream myfile;
5687 myfile.open(multizone_filename.data(), ios::out | ios::trunc);
5688 myfile.setf(ios::uppercase | ios::scientific);
5689 myfile.precision(8);
5690
5691 myfile << "TITLE = \"Global index visualization file\"" << endl;
5692 myfile << "VARIABLES =" << endl;
5693 myfile.width(10);
5694 myfile << "\"iSpan\"";
5695 myfile.width(20);
5696 myfile << "\"x_coord\"";
5697 myfile.width(20);
5698 myfile << "\"y_coord\"";
5699 myfile.width(20);
5700 myfile << "\"z_coord\"";
5701 myfile.width(20);
5702 myfile << "\"radius\"";
5703 myfile.width(20);
5704 myfile << "\"Relative Angular Coord \"";
5705 myfile.width(20);
5706 myfile << "\"Delta Angular Coord \"";
5707 myfile.width(20);
5708 myfile << "\"processor\"" << endl;
5709 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5710 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5711 radius = sqrt(x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] +
5712 y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5713 myfile.width(10);
5714 myfile << iSpan;
5715 myfile.width(20);
5716 myfile << x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5717 myfile.width(20);
5718 myfile << y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5719 myfile.width(20);
5720 myfile << z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5721 myfile.width(20);
5722 myfile << radius;
5723 if (nDim == 2) {
5724 myfile.width(20);
5725 myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5726 myfile.width(20);
5727 myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5728 } else {
5729 myfile.width(20);
5730 myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * 180.0 / PI_NUMBER;
5731 myfile.width(20);
5732 myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] * 180.0 / PI_NUMBER;
5733 }
5734 myfile.width(20);
5735 myfile << rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] << endl;
5736 }
5737 myfile << endl;
5738 }
5739 }
5740
5741 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5742 delete[] x_loc[iSpan];
5743 delete[] y_loc[iSpan];
5744 delete[] z_loc[iSpan];
5745 delete[] angCoord_loc[iSpan];
5746 delete[] deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan];
5747 delete[] rank_loc[iSpan];
5748 }
5749
5750 delete[] area;
5751 delete[] ordered;
5752 delete[] disordered;
5753 delete[] oldVertex3D;
5754 delete[] checkAssign;
5755 delete[] TurboNormal;
5756 delete[] unitnormal;
5757 delete[] NormalArea;
5758 delete[] x_loc;
5759 delete[] y_loc;
5760 delete[] z_loc;
5761 delete[] angCoord_loc;
5762 delete[] nTotVertex_gb;
5763 delete[] nVertexSpanHalo;
5764 delete[] angPitch;
5765 delete[] deltaAngPitch;
5766 delete[] deltaAngCoord_loc;
5767 delete[] rank_loc;
5768 delete[] minAngPitch;
5769 delete[] maxAngPitch;
5770 delete[] minIntAngPitch;
5771}
5772
5773void CPhysicalGeometry::UpdateTurboVertex(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag) {
5774 unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
5775 long iSpanVertex, iPoint;
5776 su2double *coord, *TurboNormal, Normal2;
5777
5778 /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
5779 TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
5780
5781 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5782 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5783 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5784 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5785 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5786 for (iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++) {
5787 iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
5788 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5789 /*--- compute appropriate turbo normal ---*/
5790 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
5791 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
5792 Normal2 = 0.0;
5793 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5794 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5795 TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5796 TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5797 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5798 } else {
5799 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5800 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5801 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5802 }
5803 break;
5804 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
5805 Normal2 = 0.0;
5806 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5807 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
5808 TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5809 TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5810 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5811 } else {
5812 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5813 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5814 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5815 }
5816 break;
5817 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
5818 Normal2 = 0.0;
5819 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5820 if (nDim == 3) {
5821 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5822 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5823 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5824 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5825 } else {
5826 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5827 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5828 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5829 }
5830 } else {
5831 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5832 TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
5833 TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5834 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5835 } else {
5836 TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
5837 TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5838 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5839 }
5840 }
5841
5842 break;
5843 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5844 Normal2 = 0.0;
5845 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5846 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5847 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5848 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5849 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5850 } else {
5851 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5852 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5853 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5854 }
5855 break;
5856
5857 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5858 Normal2 = 0.0;
5859 for (iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 += coord[iDim] * coord[iDim];
5860 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
5861 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5862 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5863 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5864 } else {
5865 TurboNormal[0] = coord[0] / sqrt(Normal2);
5866 TurboNormal[1] = coord[1] / sqrt(Normal2);
5867 TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5868 }
5869 break;
5870 }
5871
5872 /*--- store the new turbo normal ---*/
5873 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5874 }
5875 }
5876 }
5877 }
5878 }
5879 }
5880
5881 delete[] TurboNormal;
5882}
5883
5884void CPhysicalGeometry::SetAvgTurboValue(CConfig* config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag,
5885 bool allocate) {
5886 unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
5887 unsigned long iPoint;
5888 su2double *TurboNormal, *coord, *Normal, turboNormal2, Normal2, *gridVel, TotalArea, TotalRadius, radius;
5889 su2double *TotalTurboNormal, *TotalNormal, *TotalGridVel, Area;
5890 long iVertex;
5891 /*-- Variables declaration and allocation ---*/
5892 TotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5893 TotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5894 TurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5895 TotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
5896 Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5897
5898 bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
5899#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5900 su2double MyTotalArea, MyTotalRadius, *MyTotalTurboNormal = nullptr, *MyTotalNormal = nullptr,
5901 *MyTotalGridVel = nullptr;
5902#endif
5903
5904 /*--- Intialization of the vector for the interested boundary ---*/
5905 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
5906 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5907 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5908 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5909 if (allocate) {
5910 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5911 AverageNormal[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5912 AverageGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5913 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5914 SpanArea[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5915 TurboRadius[iMarker] = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1];
5916 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5917 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5918 AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5919 AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double[nDim];
5920 }
5921 }
5922 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1] + 1; iSpan++) {
5923 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5924 SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5925 TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
5926 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5927 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5928 AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5929 AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
5930 }
5931 }
5932 }
5933 }
5934 }
5935 }
5936
5937 /*--- start computing the average quantities span wise --- */
5938 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]; iSpan++) {
5939 /*--- Forces initialization for contenitors to zero ---*/
5940 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5941 TotalTurboNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5942 TotalNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5943 TotalGridVel[iDim] = 0.0;
5944 }
5945 TotalArea = 0.0;
5946 TotalRadius = 0.0;
5947 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
5948 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
5949 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
5950 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
5951 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
5952 iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
5953 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5954 turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5955 coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5956
5957 if (nDim == 3) {
5958 radius = sqrt(coord[0] * coord[0] + coord[1] * coord[1]);
5959 } else {
5960 radius = 0.0;
5961 }
5962 Area = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetArea();
5963 TotalArea += Area;
5964 TotalRadius += radius;
5965 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5966 TotalTurboNormal[iDim] += TurboNormal[iDim];
5967 TotalNormal[iDim] += Normal[iDim];
5968 }
5969 if (grid_movement) {
5970 gridVel = nodes->GetGridVel(iPoint);
5971 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) TotalGridVel[iDim] += gridVel[iDim];
5972 }
5973 }
5974 }
5975 }
5976 }
5977 }
5978
5979#ifdef HAVE_MPI
5980
5981 MyTotalArea = TotalArea;
5982 TotalArea = 0;
5983 MyTotalRadius = TotalRadius;
5984 TotalRadius = 0;
5985 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalArea, &TotalArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5986 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalRadius, &TotalRadius, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5987
5988 MyTotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5989 MyTotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
5990 MyTotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
5991
5992 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5993 MyTotalTurboNormal[iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
5994 TotalTurboNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5995 MyTotalNormal[iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim];
5996 TotalNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
5997 MyTotalGridVel[iDim] = TotalGridVel[iDim];
5998 TotalGridVel[iDim] = 0.0;
5999 }
6000
6001 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalTurboNormal, TotalTurboNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6002 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalNormal, TotalNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6003 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalGridVel, TotalGridVel, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6004
6005 delete[] MyTotalTurboNormal;
6006 delete[] MyTotalNormal;
6007 delete[] MyTotalGridVel;
6008
6009#endif
6010
6011 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
6012 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
6013 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
6014 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
6015 SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalArea;
6016 TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalRadius / nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6017
6018 turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6019 Normal2 = 0.0;
6020 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6021 turboNormal2 += TotalTurboNormal[iDim] * TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
6022 Normal2 += TotalNormal[iDim] * TotalNormal[iDim];
6023 }
6024 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6025 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim] / sqrt(turboNormal2);
6026 AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim] / sqrt(Normal2);
6027 }
6028 if (grid_movement) {
6029 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6030 AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalGridVel[iDim] / nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6031 }
6032 switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)) {
6033 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIFUGAL:
6034 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL:
6035 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
6036 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6037 -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6038 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6039 } else {
6040 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6041 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6042 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6043 }
6044 break;
6045 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL:
6046 if (marker_flag == INFLOW && nDim == 2) {
6047 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6048 -AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] +
6049 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6050 } else {
6051 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6052 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6053 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6054 }
6055 break;
6056 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
6057 if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW) {
6058 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6059 (AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6060 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6061 } else {
6062 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6063 -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6064 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6065 }
6066 break;
6067 case TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
6068 if (marker_flag == INFLOW) {
6069 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6070 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6071 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6072 } else {
6073 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] =
6074 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] -
6075 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1] * AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6076 }
6077 break;
6078
6079 default:
6080 SU2_MPI::Error("Tang grid velocity NOT IMPLEMENTED YET for this configuration", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
6081 break;
6082 }
6083 }
6084
6085 /*--- Compute the 1D average values ---*/
6086 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] +=
6087 AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] / nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
6088 SpanArea[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]] += SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan];
6089 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6090 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] +=
6091 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6092 AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] += AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6093 AverageGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] +=
6094 AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] / nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1];
6095 }
6096 }
6097 }
6098 }
6099 }
6100 }
6101
6102 /*--- Normalize 1D normals---*/
6103 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
6104 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
6105 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
6106 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag) {
6107 turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6108 Normal2 = 0.0;
6109
6110 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6111 turboNormal2 += AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] *
6112 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim];
6113 Normal2 += AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] *
6114 AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim];
6115 }
6116 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6117 AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] /= sqrt(turboNormal2);
6118 AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag - 1]][iDim] /= sqrt(Normal2);
6119 }
6120 }
6121 }
6122 }
6123 }
6124
6125 delete[] TotalTurboNormal;
6126 delete[] TotalNormal;
6127 delete[] TotalGridVel;
6128 delete[] TurboNormal;
6129 delete[] Normal;
6130}
6131
6132void CPhysicalGeometry::GatherInOutAverageValues(CConfig* config, bool allocate) {
6133 unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP;
6134 unsigned short iSpan, iDim;
6135 int markerTP;
6136 su2double nBlades;
6137 unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
6138
6139 su2double tangGridVelIn, tangGridVelOut;
6140 su2double areaIn, areaOut, pitchIn, Pitch;
6141 su2double radiusIn, radiusOut, *turboNormal;
6142
6143 turboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6144 Pitch = 0.0;
6145
6146 if (allocate) {
6147 for (iMarkerTP = 0; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance(); iMarkerTP++) {
6148 SpanAreaIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6149 TangGridVelIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6150 TurboRadiusIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6151 SpanAreaOut[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6152 TangGridVelOut[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6153 TurboRadiusOut[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1];
6154
6155 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() + 1; iSpan++) {
6156 SpanAreaIn[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6157 TangGridVelIn[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6158 TurboRadiusIn[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6159 SpanAreaOut[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6160 TangGridVelOut[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6161 TurboRadiusOut[iMarkerTP][iSpan] = 0.0;
6162 }
6163 }
6164 }
6165
6166 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections + 1; iSpan++) {
6167#ifdef HAVE_MPI
6168 unsigned short i, n1, n2, n1t, n2t;
6169 su2double *TurbGeoIn = nullptr, *TurbGeoOut = nullptr;
6170 su2double *TotTurbGeoIn = nullptr, *TotTurbGeoOut = nullptr;
6171 int* TotMarkerTP;
6172
6173 n1 = 6;
6174 n2 = 3;
6175 n1t = n1 * size;
6176 n2t = n2 * size;
6177 TurbGeoIn = new su2double[n1];
6178 TurbGeoOut = new su2double[n2];
6179
6180 for (i = 0; i < n1; i++) TurbGeoIn[i] = -1.0;
6181 for (i = 0; i < n2; i++) TurbGeoOut[i] = -1.0;
6182#endif
6183 pitchIn = 0.0;
6184 areaIn = -1.0;
6185 tangGridVelIn = -1.0;
6186 radiusIn = -1.0;
6187 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6188 turboNormal[iDim] = -1.0;
6189 }
6190
6191 areaOut = -1.0;
6192 tangGridVelOut = -1.0;
6193 radiusOut = -1.0;
6194
6195 markerTP = -1;
6196
6197 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
6198 for (iMarkerTP = 1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery() + 1; iMarkerTP++) {
6199 if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP) {
6200 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == INFLOW) {
6201 markerTP = iMarkerTP;
6202 if (iSpan < nSpanWiseSections) {
6203 pitchIn = MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] - MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
6204 }
6205 areaIn = SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan];
6206 tangGridVelIn = AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan];
6207 radiusIn = TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan];
6208 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) turboNormal[iDim] = AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6209
6210#ifdef HAVE_MPI
6211 TurbGeoIn[0] = areaIn;
6212 TurbGeoIn[1] = tangGridVelIn;
6213 TurbGeoIn[2] = radiusIn;
6214 TurbGeoIn[3] = turboNormal[0];
6215 TurbGeoIn[4] = turboNormal[1];
6216 TurbGeoIn[5] = pitchIn;
6217#endif
6218 }
6219
6220 /*--- retrieve outlet information ---*/
6221 if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == OUTFLOW) {
6222 if (iSpan < nSpanWiseSections) {
6223 pitchIn = MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] - MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
6224 }
6225 areaOut = SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan];
6226 tangGridVelOut = AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan];
6227 radiusOut = TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan];
6228#ifdef HAVE_MPI
6229 TurbGeoOut[0] = areaOut;
6230 TurbGeoOut[1] = tangGridVelOut;
6231 TurbGeoOut[2] = radiusOut;
6232#endif
6233 }
6234 }
6235 }
6236 }
6237
6238#ifdef HAVE_MPI
6239 TotTurbGeoIn = new su2double[n1t];
6240 TotTurbGeoOut = new su2double[n2t];
6241 for (i = 0; i < n1t; i++) TotTurbGeoIn[i] = -1.0;
6242 for (i = 0; i < n2t; i++) TotTurbGeoOut[i] = -1.0;
6243 TotMarkerTP = new int[size];
6244 for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
6245 TotMarkerTP[i] = -1;
6246 }
6247
6248 SU2_MPI::Allgather(TurbGeoIn, n1, MPI_DOUBLE, TotTurbGeoIn, n1, MPI_DOUBLE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6249 SU2_MPI::Allgather(TurbGeoOut, n2, MPI_DOUBLE, TotTurbGeoOut, n2, MPI_DOUBLE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6250 SU2_MPI::Allgather(&markerTP, 1, MPI_INT, TotMarkerTP, 1, MPI_INT, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6251
6252 delete[] TurbGeoIn, delete[] TurbGeoOut;
6253
6254 for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
6255 if (TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i] > 0.0) {
6256 areaIn = 0.0;
6257 areaIn = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i];
6258 tangGridVelIn = 0.0;
6259 tangGridVelIn = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i + 1];
6260 radiusIn = 0.0;
6261 radiusIn = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i + 2];
6262 turboNormal[0] = 0.0;
6263 turboNormal[0] = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i + 3];
6264 turboNormal[1] = 0.0;
6265 turboNormal[1] = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i + 4];
6266 pitchIn = 0.0;
6267 pitchIn = TotTurbGeoIn[n1 * i + 5];
6268
6269 markerTP = -1;
6270 markerTP = TotMarkerTP[i];
6271 }
6272
6273 if (TotTurbGeoOut[n2 * i] > 0.0) {
6274 areaOut = 0.0;
6275 areaOut = TotTurbGeoOut[n2 * i];
6276 tangGridVelOut = 0.0;
6277 tangGridVelOut = TotTurbGeoOut[n2 * i + 1];
6278 radiusOut = 0.0;
6279 radiusOut = TotTurbGeoOut[n2 * i + 2];
6280 }
6281 }
6282
6283 delete[] TotTurbGeoIn, delete[] TotTurbGeoOut;
6284 delete[] TotMarkerTP;
6285
6286#endif
6287
6288 Pitch += pitchIn / nSpanWiseSections;
6289
6290 if (iSpan == nSpanWiseSections) {
6291 config->SetFreeStreamTurboNormal(turboNormal);
6292 if (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(config->GetiZone()) == TURBOMACHINERY_TYPE::AXIAL && nDim == 2) {
6293 nBlades = 1 / Pitch;
6294 } else {
6295 nBlades = 2 * PI_NUMBER / Pitch;
6296 }
6297 config->SetnBlades(config->GetiZone(), nBlades);
6298 }
6299
6300 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6301 /*----Quantities needed for computing the turbomachinery performance -----*/
6302 SpanAreaIn[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = areaIn;
6303 TangGridVelIn[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = tangGridVelIn;
6304 TurboRadiusIn[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = radiusIn;
6305
6306 SpanAreaOut[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = areaOut;
6307 TangGridVelOut[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = tangGridVelOut;
6308 TurboRadiusOut[markerTP - 1][iSpan] = radiusOut;
6309 }
6310 }
6311 delete[] turboNormal;
6312}
6313
6314void CPhysicalGeometry::SetAvgTurboGeoValues(const CConfig* donor_config, CGeometry* donor_geometry,
6315 unsigned short donorZone) {
6316 unsigned short iSpan;
6317 unsigned short nSpanMaxAllZones = donor_config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones();
6318
6319 for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanMaxAllZones + 1; iSpan++) {
6320 SetTurboRadiusIn(donor_geometry->GetTurboRadiusIn(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6321 SetSpanAreaIn(donor_geometry->GetSpanAreaIn(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6322 SetTangGridVelIn(donor_geometry->GetTangGridVelIn(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6323 SetTurboRadiusOut(donor_geometry->GetTurboRadiusOut(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6324 SetSpanAreaOut(donor_geometry->GetSpanAreaOut(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6325 SetTangGridVelOut(donor_geometry->GetTangGridVelOut(donorZone, iSpan), donorZone, iSpan);
6326 }
6327}
6328
6329void CPhysicalGeometry::SetMaxLength(CConfig* config) {
6330 SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(roundUpDiv(nPointDomain, omp_get_max_threads()))
6331 for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
