10276 }
10277
10278 /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
10279
10280 Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10281 Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10282 Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10283 Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10284
10285 /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
10286
10287 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10288 ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, nullptr,
10289 Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10290 Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
10291 }
10292
10293 /*--- Compute airfoil characteristic only in the master node ---*/
10294
10295 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
10296 /*--- Write an output file---*/
10297
10298 if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10299 Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.csv", ios::out);
10300 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10301 Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius "
10302 "(1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge "
10303 "ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10304 << endl;
10305 else
10306 Nacelle_File
10307 << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius "
10308 "(1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading "
10309 "Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10310 << endl;
10311 } else {
10312 Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.dat", ios::out);
10313 Nacelle_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle description\"" << endl;
10314 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10315 Nacelle_File
10316 << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord "
10317 "(in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge "
10318 "XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10319 << endl;
10320 else
10321 Nacelle_File
10322 << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord "
10323 "(m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge "
10324 "XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\""
10325 << endl;
10326 Nacelle_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline nacelle\"" << endl;
10327 }
10328
10329 /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
10330
10331 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10332 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
10333 LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10334 TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10335 }
10336
10337 Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
10338 MaxThickness[iPlane] = 0.0;
10339 Chord[iPlane] = 0.0;
10340 LERadius[iPlane] = 0.0;
10341 ToC[iPlane] = 0.0;
10342 Twist[iPlane] = 0.0;
10343
10344 if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10345 Compute_Wing_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
10346 Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10347
10348 Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10349 Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10350
10351 MaxThickness[iPlane] =
10352 Compute_MaxThickness(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10353 Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10354
10355 Chord[iPlane] = Compute_Chord(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10356 Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10357
10358 Twist[iPlane] = Compute_Twist(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10359 Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10360
10361 LERadius[iPlane] = Compute_LERadius(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10362 Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10363
10364 ToC[iPlane] = MaxThickness[iPlane] / Chord[iPlane];
10365 }
10366 }
10367
10368 /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
10369
10370 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10371 su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]) / PI_NUMBER * 180 + 180;
10372
10373 if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10374 if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10375 Nacelle_File << theta_deg << ", " << Area[iPlane] << ", " << MaxThickness[iPlane] << ", " << Chord[iPlane]
10376 << ", " << LERadius[iPlane] << ", " << ToC[iPlane] << ", " << Twist[iPlane] << ", "
10377 << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] << ", " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << ", " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]
10378 << ", " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10379 } else {
10380 Nacelle_File << theta_deg << " " << Area[iPlane] << " " << MaxThickness[iPlane] << " " << Chord[iPlane] << " "
10381 << LERadius[iPlane] << " " << ToC[iPlane] << " " << Twist[iPlane] << " "
10382 << LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] << " " << LeadingEdge[iPlane][2] << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]
10383 << " " << TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10384 }
10385 }
10386 }
10387
10388 Nacelle_File.close();
10389
10390 Section_File.open("nacelle_slices.dat", ios::out);
10391
10392 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10393 if (iPlane == 0) {
10394 Section_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle Slices\"" << endl;
10395 if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10396 Section_File << R"lit(VARIABLES = "x (in)", "y (in)", "z (in)", "x<sub>2D</sub>/c", "y<sub>2D</sub>/c")lit"
10397 << endl;
10398 else
10399 Section_File << R"lit(VARIABLES = "x (m)", "y (m)", "z (m)", "x<sub>2D</sub>/c", "y<sub>2D</sub>/c")lit"
10400 << endl;
10401 }
10402
10403 if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10404 su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]) / PI_NUMBER * 180 + 180;
10405 su2double Angle = theta_deg * PI_NUMBER / 180 - 0.5 * PI_NUMBER;
10406
10407 Section_File << "ZONE T=\"<greek>q</greek> = " << theta_deg << " deg\", I= " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size()
10408 << ", F=POINT" << endl;
10409
10410 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
10411 /*--- Move to the origin ---*/
10412
10413 su2double XValue_ = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][0];
10414 su2double ZValue_ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][2];
10415
10416 /*--- Rotate the airfoil and divide by the chord ---*/
10417
10418 su2double ValCos = cos(Twist[iPlane] * PI_NUMBER / 180.0);
10419 su2double ValSin = sin(Twist[iPlane] * PI_NUMBER / 180.0);
10420
10421 su2double XValue = (XValue_ * ValCos - ZValue_ * ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10422 su2double ZValue = (ZValue_ * ValCos + XValue_ * ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10423
10424 su2double XCoord = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] + config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
10425 su2double YCoord =
10426 (Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * cos(Angle) - Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * sin(Angle)) +
10427 config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
10428 su2double ZCoord =
10429 (Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * cos(Angle) + Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] * sin(Angle)) +
10430 config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
10431
10432 /*--- Write the file ---*/
10433
10434 Section_File << XCoord << " " << YCoord << " " << ZCoord << " " << XValue << " " << ZValue << endl;
10435 }
10436 }
10437 }
10438
10439 Section_File.close();
10440
10441 /*--- Compute the wing volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
10442
10443 Nacelle_Volume = 0.0;
10444 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane - 2; iPlane += 2) {
10445 if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10446 Nacelle_Volume += (1.0 / 3.0) * dAngle * (Area[iPlane] + 4.0 * Area[iPlane + 1] + Area[iPlane + 2]);
10447 }
10448 }
10449
10450 /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
10451
10452 Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = -1E6;
10453 Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = 1E6;
10454 Nacelle_MinChord = 1E6;
10455 Nacelle_MaxChord = -1E6;
10456 Nacelle_MinLERadius = 1E6;
10457 Nacelle_MaxLERadius = -1E6;
10458 Nacelle_MinToC = 1E6;
10459 Nacelle_MaxToC = -1E6;
10460 Nacelle_MaxTwist = -1E6;
10461
10462 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10463 if (MaxThickness[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = min(Nacelle_MinMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10464 Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = max(Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10465 if (Chord[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinChord = min(Nacelle_MinChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10466 Nacelle_MaxChord = max(Nacelle_MaxChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10467 if (LERadius[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinLERadius = min(Nacelle_MinLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10468 Nacelle_MaxLERadius = max(Nacelle_MaxLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10469 if (ToC[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinToC = min(Nacelle_MinToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10470 Nacelle_MaxToC = max(Nacelle_MaxToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10471 Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC = sqrt((Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07) * (Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07));
10472 Nacelle_MaxTwist = max(Nacelle_MaxTwist, fabs(Twist[iPlane]));
10473 }
10474 }
10475
10476 /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
10477
10478 delete[] Xcoord_Airfoil;
10479 delete[] Ycoord_Airfoil;
10480 delete[] Zcoord_Airfoil;
10481 delete[] Variable_Airfoil;
10482
10483 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
10484 delete[] LeadingEdge;
10485
10486 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
10487 delete[] TrailingEdge;
10488
10489 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_P0[iPlane];
10490 delete[] Plane_P0;
10491
10492 for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) delete[] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
10493 delete[] Plane_Normal;
10494
10495 delete[] Area;
10496 delete[] MaxThickness;
10497 delete[] Chord;
10498 delete[] LERadius;
10499 delete[] ToC;
10500 delete[] Twist;
10501}
10502
10503std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeViscousWallADT(const CConfig* config) const {
10504 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10505 /*--- Step 1: Create the coordinates and connectivity of the linear ---*/
10506 /*--- subelements of the local boundaries that must be taken ---*/
10507 /*--- into account in the wall distance computation. ---*/
10508 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10509
10510 /* Initialize an array for the mesh points, which eventually contains the
10511 mapping from the local nodes to the number used in the connectivity of the
10512 local boundary faces. However, in a first pass it is an indicator whether
10513 or not a mesh point is on a local wall boundary. */
10514 vector<unsigned long> meshToSurface(nPoint, 0);
10515
10516 /* Define the vectors for the connectivity of the local linear subelements,
10517 the element ID's, the element type and marker ID's. */
10518 vector<unsigned long> surfaceConn;
10519 vector<unsigned long> elemIDs;
10520 vector<unsigned short> VTK_TypeElem;
10521 vector<unsigned short> markerIDs;
10522
10523 /* Loop over the boundary markers. */
10524
10525 for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); ++iMarker) {
10526 /* Check for a viscous wall. */
10527 if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) {
10528 /* Loop over the surface elements of this marker. */
10529 for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
10530 /* Set the flag of the mesh points on this surface to true. */
10531 for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
10532 unsigned long iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
10533 meshToSurface[iPoint] = 1;
10534 }
10535 /* Determine the necessary data from the corresponding standard face,
10536 such as the number of linear subfaces, the number of DOFs per
10537 linear subface and the corresponding local connectivity. */
10538 const unsigned short VTK_Type = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type();
10539 const unsigned short nDOFsPerElem = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes();
10540
10541 /* Loop over the nodes of element and store the required data. */
10542
10543 markerIDs.push_back(iMarker);
10544 VTK_TypeElem.push_back(VTK_Type);
10545 elemIDs.push_back(iElem);
10546 for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < nDOFsPerElem; iNode++)
10547 surfaceConn.push_back(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode));
10548 }
10549 }
10550 }
10551
10552 /*--- Create the coordinates of the local points on the viscous surfaces and
10553 create the final version of the mapping from all volume points to the
10554 points on the viscous surfaces. ---*/
10555 vector<su2double> surfaceCoor;
10556 unsigned long nVertex_SolidWall = 0;
10557
10558 for (unsigned long i = 0; i < nPoint; ++i) {
10559 if (meshToSurface[i]) {
10560 meshToSurface[i] = nVertex_SolidWall++;
10561
10562 for (unsigned short k = 0; k < nDim; ++k) surfaceCoor.push_back(nodes->GetCoord(i, k));
10563 }
10564 }
10565
10566 /*--- Change the surface connectivity, such that it corresponds to
10567 the entries in surfaceCoor rather than in meshPoints. ---*/
10568 for (unsigned long i = 0; i < surfaceConn.size(); ++i) surfaceConn[i] = meshToSurface[surfaceConn[i]];
10569
10570 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10571 /*--- Step 2: Build the ADT, which is an ADT of bounding boxes of the ---*/
10572 /*--- surface elements. A nearest point search does not give ---*/
10573 /*--- accurate results, especially not for the integration ---*/
10574 /*--- points of the elements close to a wall boundary. ---*/
10575 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10576
10577 std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> WallADT(
10578 new CADTElemClass(nDim, surfaceCoor, surfaceConn, VTK_TypeElem, markerIDs, elemIDs, true));
10579
10580 return WallADT;
10581}
10582
10583/*--- Use a thread-sanitizer dependent loop schedule to work around suspected false positives ---*/
10584#ifndef __SANITIZE_THREAD__
10585#define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint, 2 * omp_get_max_threads()))
10586#else
10587#define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR SU2_OMP_FOR_()
10588#endif
10589
10590#define END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR END_SU2_OMP_FOR
10591
10592void CPhysicalGeometry::SetWallDistance(CADTElemClass* WallADT, const CConfig* config, unsigned short iZone) {
10593 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10594 /*--- Step 3: Loop over all interior mesh nodes and compute minimum ---*/
10595 /*--- distance to a solid wall element ---*/
10596 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10597
10598 if (!WallADT->IsEmpty()) {
10599 /*--- Solid wall boundary nodes are present. Compute the wall
10600 distance for all nodes. ---*/
10601
10602 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
10603 CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10604 for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < GetnPoint(); ++iPoint) {
10605 unsigned short markerID;
10606 unsigned long elemID;
10607 int rankID;
10608 su2double dist;
10609
10610 WallADT->DetermineNearestElement(nodes->GetCoord(iPoint), dist, markerID, elemID, rankID);
10611
10612 if (dist < nodes->GetWall_Distance(iPoint)) {
10613 nodes->SetWall_Distance(iPoint, dist, rankID, iZone, markerID, elemID);
10614 }
10615 }
10616 END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10617 }
10618 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
10619 }
10620}
10621
10622#undef CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
10623#undef END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
#define END_CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
Definition CPhysicalGeometry.cpp:10590
CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
#define CPHYSGEO_PARFOR
Definition CPhysicalGeometry.cpp:10585
C
#define C(i, j)
Definition blas_structure.cpp:140
B
#define B(i, j)
Definition blas_structure.cpp:139
A
#define A(i, j)
Definition blas_structure.cpp:138
